name: Meowmentum
description: Run, young Meowcolyte - finish the elders' speed trials and prove yourself worthy of wielding Meowmentum! Harness your paw-kour skills, dash through magic orbs, and race against the world!

name: Northanda Chronicles
description: Blending deck-building mechanics with party-based RPG elements. Command a trio of heroes battling through a world threatened by reality-warping Chaos, each with unique abilities but sharing a single, evolving deck. Balance the needs and strengths of multiple characters to forge a unified strategy.

name: He is Coming
description: He is coming is a rougelike autobattler where you have to collect and combine powerful items in order to defeat the demon king and his minions. Upgrade your weapon, discover hidden treasures and survive, because whether you're prepared or not, He is coming!

name: Cargo
description: Cargo is a space shooter where you collect packages from planets and try to deliver them to other planets without being killed.

name: Zombie Dolls
description: Fend off hordes of cute zombified dolls using guns, bombs, bats, and boomerangs. Zombie Dolls is a light-hearted, but intense, stand your ground shoot em up game. Don't be fooled by their friendly appearance, they are tough and unrelenting!

name: Aether Singularity
description: Take on the role of a special agent and fight against digital demons from the Aethernet with your Daemon partner. Something's gone wrong in a prominent research facility, and you and your squad have been deployed to uncover the source of the demonic threat that's been unleashed. Destroy all demons!

name: Loki's Revenge
description: Loki’s Revenge is a bullet heaven roguelite where you play as Norse gods fighting Loki’s army of monsters! Level up to gain powerful upgrades and explore the hand-crafted maps to find secret items. Build the ultimate overpowered god with permanent upgrades and master each god’s signature weapon.

name: Alchemist Shop Simulator
description: Conquer the arcane market in Alchemist Shop Simulator! Set up your very own magical store, full of wonders. Keep expanding your business! Experiment with ingredients bought or home-grown in your garden to brew potions for your quirky clientele. Buy low, sell high, make your store legendary!

name: Little Droid 2: Escape
description: "Little Droid 2: Escape" is a classic 2D (Metroidvania) side-scrolling pixel art adventure where you need to find a way to escape a mysterious planet.

name: Bee Hero: Bug Blaster
description: Bee Hero: Bug Blaster is an Action RPG Looter Shooter with a focus on build theorycrafting. Exterminate bug hordes, collect gold and items, level up, acquire new skills, upgrade your weapon and fight bosses.

name: Witch Way
description: A dark witch imprisoned by the Church is forced to turn against her own kind, seeking the most chaotic power within the constraints of trust. This is not just a battle against enemies in action, but also requires a strategic and panoramic vision.

name: Mini Worlds
description: Mini Worlds is a cozy building game about creating tiny cities on a small world.

name: Camille and Laura
description: Camille and Laura is a point and click about the greatest adventure of all: parenting.

name: E-FCC
description: Immerse yourself in the action with E-FCC, the official Fast Close Combat video game, now available on Steam! E-FCC brings you a realistic airsoft simulation experience, based on the innovative sport of Fast Close Combat (FCC). Take on your friends or other online players in intense 1-on-1 duels where every hit counts.

name: Hero of the Hive
description: Take flight in this casual adventure game as a bee on a mission to save your crumbling hive. With the Queen mysteriously missing, it's up to you to gather resources to rebuild, explore the vast basin, and embark on quests to help the animals of nature as you become the hero your hive needs!

name: Type-Noise: Shonen Shojo
description: Traumatized youth trapped in 'Noise Scramble City', a labyrinth of their own fears. Amnesiac teens solve puzzles in a multi-ending escape adventure.

name: Verve
description: Welcome to Verve. You are RT-6, a member of Liminal Leap's highly-trained professional rescuing team. You are tasked to find the location of a small group of research scientists who sent out a high-level distress call from deep within the void of Verve. Good luck, the Verve is unforgiving.

name: Chemist Wanted
description: Chemist Wanted is a crafting game with a difference! In this lab simulator, you use practical chemistry to make compounds and sell them. Set up your equipment, run the experiments and create your products. But be careful who you cut deals with - you might get more than you bargained for!

name: Darkwater
description: A cooperative survival horror game where you take command of a submarine trapped under the ice of an alien planet.

name: Puzzled Hive
description: Puzzled Hive is a simple, beehive based puzzle game in which you play as Meo and help him explore this strange place in search of his answers.

name: Gensokyo: Presumption of Guilt - Pansies Before Dawn
description: An ancient village, once sealed by yokais for a millennium, is now plagued by a series of bizarre yokai murders. Follow the protagonist as they delve into the investigation, unravelling the mysteries submerged in the history.

name: Footsy
description: Footsy is a chaotic multiplayer soccer party game set inside grandma's house! Smash furniture, shatter bottles, and tumble TVs as you compete in wild, goal-scoring action. Customize your characters, challenge your friends, and embrace the crazy destruction in every room!

name: Don't Trust
description: Don't Trust is a multiplayer horror game about deception. There are a group of survivors on a military base, and one of the survivors is secretly infected. The infected can transform into the survivor form to trick the other players.

name: Project Forgemaster
description: Inspired by the classic Ragnarok Online, Project Forgemaster is an aRPG where you, a player from the real world, are born in a forge. Summoned for the Realm to level up, explore, and loot monsters. Remember that the king will soon seek your assistance as you forge your path to glory.

name: Rancher: A New Life
description: Start a new life as a Rancher. Travel the forest paths by quad bike, raise cattle, build, repair, and improve your farm. Take care of animals, go fishing, cook, grow vegetables, practice your accuracy on shooting range, take photos, and much more. Relax away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

name: Starsand Island
description: Leave the hustle of the city behind and embrace life on Starsand Island. Fish, farm, raise animals, and befriend or fall in love with locals to learn their secrets. Customize your world with our DIY system, and invite friends to help build your dream paradise!

name: Paradise Beach Simulator
description: Paradise Beach Simulator is a first-person management simulation game where you transform an abandoned island into a successful business. Welcome your guests, maintain your equipment, manage your staff, and explore your island, all while restoring the beauty of a lost paradise.

name: Floridale Man: The Joy of Chaos
description: Welcome to the sunny state of Floridale! Make the most of your stay by causing problems on purpose, mingling with hotties and gators, and embracing the chaos of life in this comedy physics collectathon.

name: Love Curse: Find Your Soulmate
description: It is a girls' love visual novel set against the backdrop of college and the workplace. The protagonist carries a love curse and is searching for her true love. However, as events unfold, she finds herself facing even bigger challenges...

name: Castle Crashers: Painter Boss Paradise
description:
We used to be enemies. We used to destroy the world around us. Now, we create!
The DLC will include:
Steam workshop capabilities – create your own knight skins, choose your magic, and share with the world!
New official character: play as Paint Junior, use your imagination, and unleash powerful art to vanquish your foes!
New player and weapon artwork for all official playable characters (with an option to toggle on or off).
Endless knightly possibilities – if you aren’t feeling creative, choose from thousands of community characters or preloaded characters created by our team!

name: Gnomer
description: The gnomes got no chance ! Drop down through levels filled with hostile gnomes. Kill gnomes, upgrade your gear and buy buildings that will help you on your Journey.

name: Pozionista
description: Travel through a world surrounded by nature, collect plants and use them to create potions, invent new recipes, sell potions in stores and explore the world.

name: MeowFall
description: MeowFall is a charming 2D platformer in pixel art style. Take control of an adorable cat, overcome obstacles and uncover the secrets. Are you ready for an adventure to find the best hat ever?

name: JumpMap
description: JumpMap is an exciting first-person 3D platformer that features a special mechanic: every time you fall, you get put back to where you were before. Explore 20+ carefully designed levels that challenge your skills. Now with Speedrun Mode: race through all levels and track your best times!

name: Whisper of the Swallows
description: Sink into a vast, strange and unforgiving world, in procedural generation. Fight against extreme climatic conditions. Alone or in cooperation, survive, explore, build and bring light back to the chaos.

name: Carpocalypse RC Racing
description: The World may be over, but the fun is just about to begin! Get ready to race in this post apocalyptic racing game. Visit abandoned warehouse, shop, restaurant or someone's home. Become the champion in Championship Mode or try to survive in Mayhem mode. Warning! Versus mode can ruin your friendship!

name: The Run: Got Next
description: The Run: Got Next is a fast-paced, full court, 3v3 basketball game that celebrates all of street hoops culture worldwide. Play solo online or squad up to stack wins and become the G.O.A.T. Who’s Next?

name: Crown and Adventure
description: An open-world adventure RPG game. Choose your favorite character, train your elite legion step by step, and crash all enemies on the battlefield. Strengthen yourself, establish a powerful family, create a great dynasty, and become the dominator of this fantasy world.

name: Sliding Hero
description: Sliding Hero is a top-down puzzle Metroidvania where you slide in a single direction until hitting an obstacle. Trapped in a sinister 1700s Venetian villa, explore a world inspired by Venice’s carnival that will test your wits to overcome challenges, uncover secrets, and unmask your destiny.

name: The Whittled Horse
description: A boy named Thomas and his friend Evey are trusted to deliver a package. Little do they know there is a force stalking them, and what they carry will decide the future.

name: Gun Crate Raccoon
description: Gun Crate Raccoon is a fast-paced arcade platformer where you collect crates to skyrocket your highscore and conquer the leaderboard. Climb higher and unfold the mysteries of the Tower.

name: Pixel Parkour
description: Fast, fluid movement is at the core of this vibrant indie adventure. Blast through beautiful landscapes and complete speed challenges to find your purpose in this picturesque, pixelated world.

name: Niraya of
description: "Niraya of " is a Japanese horror game inspired by the Buddhist beliefs. The game focuses on a unique system where players "avoid" the attacks of various monsters. This, combined with the fear of exploring eerie environments and solving puzzles, is a major draw of the game.

name: Whiskerwood
description: Establish a home for your industrious mice under the oppressive paw of your cat overlords in this city builder featuring complex simulations, intricate production chains, and the age-old rivalry between cat and mouse.

name: Scholomatch
description: Match gems, level up, and date wizards in this match-3 visual novel with a lot of heart and a little spice. Form deep relationships with faeries, sirens and werewolves, each with their own endearing personalities and challenges. Make choices that affect your relationships, and their destinies.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 17: Lucy
description: Adds Lucy to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 16: Unika
description: Adds Unika to the roster of playable characters

name: Splitgate 2
description: Portal into the action as an elite Ace in Splitgate 2, the only free-to-play shooter where you can teleport across the map to outsmart your opponents. Team up, customize weapons, and master portaling skills as you compete for glory in epic showdowns.

name: 100 Cats London: Extra Content
description: Play a brand new level enriched with intricate details. 100 Cats have once again decided to hide themselves in London.

name: Brutalist
description: Brutalist is a third-person meditative game where you need to follow paths, find passages, solve riddles, watch out for radiation and monitor oxygen levels. And all this is surrounded by an atmospheric abandoned concrete world.

name: Exiler
description: Face demons and occult rituals in Exiler, a gripping horror quest adventure. Perform banishing rites by combining skills and improvised means, uncover eerie secrets, and save innocent souls in a race against time. Be the exorcist or die possessed.

name: Spy Drops
description: Inspired by stealth action from the 90’s, undertake a series of covert ops to save the world from a global terrorist threat. Experience PS generation, 3D stealth action updated with modern effects, randomly generated levels, modern equipment, and head-to-head local multiplayer.

name: Monster DNA
description:
At the international space center of research, something we never ask is why. Our clients are from all corners of the new world's universe and we're sworn to secrecy. We deliver our exclusive hybrids monsters as demanded, and of course, we make sure our hybrids have the best possible work contracts. Our source DNA is sourced from the most notorious galactic inmates seeking participation in our programs, often aiming to secure prison perks or time reductions as they negotiated with their administration.

Your job? Create the monsters we seek, and do a quality control on them, whether it's painful or not.

Each playthrough is unique. You can experience it multiple times.

name: Arashi Gaiden
description: Arashi Gaiden is a turn-based action game, with frantic combat, in the dash-and-slash style. Arashi is a Ronin from the Pocket Bravery universe, he was hired by his former master, Lobo, receiving the mission of defeating Ninjas and Matilha soldiers to recover 3 powerful relics from Japan.

name: Mizuki and the Crimson Moon
description: Journey through a yokai-filled Japan in this 2D Action Platformer! Control Mizuki, a carefree and playful kitsune, as she investigates evil events happening around her village. Use her signature ability of teleportation to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies in this unique platformer adventure.

name: Sky Dust
description: Sky Dust is set in a cyberpunk universe, taking place in a future where society has collapsed following a global disaster, and the lines between morality and ethics have become blurred.

name: One Last Raid
description: An arena based roguelike action RPG where you play as a skeleton warrior, who fights waves of enemies with diverse abilities. Each run you create a unique build by selecting different skills on each level up and picking up loot from fallen enemies.

name: MechaBlade Hero
description: MechaBlade Hero is an indie action adventure game where you control a robot fighting your way through an army of robots to get out of a giant tower. Face enemies and gain new weapons, solve puzzles and platform challenges in this challenging hack and slash.

name: Deep Cuts
description: Genre-bending blend of messy physics, storytelling, and highly detailed worlds. A new chapter in the Scythe Saga Universe from the horror masterminds behind Happy's Humble Burger Farm!

name: Memoreum
description: Sin descripción

name: The Occultist
description: In The Occultist, Alan Rebels travels to the cursed island of Godstone to investigate the sudden disappearance of his father. After decades of mentioning the island, all Alan knows is that his father was born and lived his early years there.

name: Aces of Thunder
description: Experience the thrill of aerial combat like never before with Aces of Thunder, the upcoming VR game made specifically with capabilities of PlayStation VR2 in mind.

name: Sloppy Forgeries
description: Sloppy Forgeries is a fast-paced, two-player local multiplayer painting game. Each player is given a mouse, a blank canvas, and a few simple paint tools. Each round, a famous painting from art history is revealed. Players race to copy the painting as quickly and accurately as possible.

name: Burden of Truth
description: The Burden of Proof saga continues! Step into the shoes of legendary prosecutor Conrad Cross during a pivotal moment of his journey. Investigate crime scenes, solve mysteries using evidence, and make your case in the courtroom. The burden lies with you to unravel the truth!

name: Fighting Force Collection
description: Who doesn’t love a good brawler? In Fighting Force, you and up two three friends have a simple, four step strategy: break things, get weapons, use those weapons to pummel people, and repeat as needed. It’s straightforward streetside carnage with a 3D flair.

name: Bubsy in: the Purrfect Collection
description:
Is Bubsy a celebrated icon from the mascot wars of the early 90s or a platforming punchline? The team at Limited Run has built a new collection to find the answer. Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection explores the franchise's troubled history and enduring popularity.

Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection is a playable history that includes games, artifacts and interviews. All of the games have been carefully updated for modern PCs and consoles using Limited Run’s proprietary Carbon Engine. Along the way the team was able to smooth out some of the games’ rough edges.

At the helm of the project is Limited Run’s Audi Sorlie, a producer, author, Bubsy World Heavyweight Champion and arguably the world’s foremost expert on the furry franchise. Together with the team at Limited Run and Atari, he has created the ultimate retrospective celebration of Bubsy, the 3’6” tall 80 pound bobcat (with a pet armadillo named Arnold). What could possibly go wrong?

name: Ghosts
description: Sin descripción

name: Table Flip Simulator
description: Had a stressful day? Blow off some steam in Table Flip Simulator! This physics-based puzzler allows you to unwind as you throw or smash items with hilarious effects. From working as a barista to becoming the President of Antarctica, you can go beyond flipping the table – the world is yours to wreck!

name: Cats Hidden Around the World 2
description: Find 1500 cats hiding in over 15 iconic locations such as Dubai, Rome or Bangkok in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Get More Fries!
description: "I'm a seagull, and I'm not just after your fries, I'm also gonna poop on humans! You guys better watch out!" This is a 3D game with some action elements

name: Five Laps at Freddy's
description:
Welcome to Five Laps at Freddy's, The premier animatronic kart racing circuit featuring you favorite and lovable Fazbear friends! Sponsored by Fazbear Entertainment

Select one of 12 of your favorite animatronic #FNaF characters and race on sixteen tracks set across 4 cups! Each track is based on your favorite locations from Five Nights at Freddy's lore, including Fazbear Hills, Midnight Motorist and more!

name: Dragon Quest I & II: HD-2D Remake
description: DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake will continue the classic RPG trilogy’s narrative, offering players two adventures to undertake in DRAGON QUEST I and DRAGON QUEST II.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Mio: Memories in Orbit
description: Play an android in MIO: Memories in Orbit, a mesmerizing metroidvania where you explore the Vessel, an enormous technological ark overgrown with machines gone rogue. Uncover its secrets, enhance MIO's abilities, and save the spaceship and its resident from oblivion!

name: Whiskers Wonderland
description: Whiskers Wonderland: a game where your pops sent you to find something that was lost in a restaurant, but be warned, Mr Whiskers doesn't like trespassers and you unfortunately are one, so he's after you... You do remember another robot named Dr Mouser. Ready to find what happend to him?

name: Shovel Knight: Shovel of Hope DX
description: Shovel Knight: Shovel of Hope DX is an enhanced edition of the pixel-perfect adventure. Jump, battle foes, and dig up treasure as you quest to defeat the Order of No Quarter and The Enchantress. DX adds 20 playable characters, online multiplayer, and new features like rewind and save states.

name: Gummy Nightmares
description: Step into the enigmatic world of Gummy Nightmares as a little boy who wakes up in a mysterious amusement park with no memory. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover lost memories while evading sinister plushie robots. Use weapons, set traps, and find hideouts to survive and reveal the truth.

name: Lunar Eclipse
description: Ealish, the sole survivor, hides in the shadows, seeking shelter from the merciless creatures that now dominate this devastated world. Immerse in the grim atmosphere of what’s happening. Fight for life, create anew, explore the unknown, become a hunter in a world where everyone has become prey!

name: Sonatina
description: Sonatina is a challenging action-adventure RPG. Fight epic battles against formidable foes using rhythmic shmup (“shoot them up”) combat.

name: Anno 117: Pax Romana
description:
In the latest instalment of the award-winning Anno strategy franchise, it’s your destiny to shape the Roman Empire in the year 117 AD. As governor, will you encourage economic growth or expand your rule through dominance? Lead with rebellion or unite a diverse culture?
The cost of peace is yours to decide.

name: ChromaGun 2: Dye Hard
description: Shoot paint, mix colors, and solve puzzles in this adventure about friendship and redemption. Just don't enter that portal to another universe, and everything will be perfectly fine.

name: Stormforge
description: Stormforge is an open-world survival crafting game for up to 8 players. You are Stormforged, with the ability to brave and harness power from magical storms. Explore, fight, forage, craft, build, and defeat bosses in this epic, fantasy game. Survive the Storms and thrive!

name: Generation Exile
description: You are aboard humanity’s first and final generation ship, a last-chance expedition now teetering on the rim of collapse. One step at a time you must rebuild society and the ship’s fragile ecosystems — using only what you brought with you — in this turn-based narrative city-builder.

name: Copa City
description: Organize high-stakes football events in the first football tycoon! Get the urban space and the stadium ready, ensure safety, and provide fans with an amazing football fiesta! But stay alert: Your decisions will not only influence the city but also the emotional rollercoaster for football fans!

name: Lorn Vale
description: A free-roaming post-apocalyptic Survival Sandbox RPG in which you must weather the unrelenting brutality of a dying world. Shape your own unique journey, forge alliances. Make difficult choices in this systems-driven game full of procedurally generated events. Amidst the ruins, your story begins.

name: Star Birds
description: Star Birds is a cheerful asteroid base-building and resource management game. Discover and mine countless asteroids, create production networks and guide your colony of spacefaring birds to new interstellar horizons!

name: Mixtape
description:
On their last night of high school, three friends embark on one more adventure together. Play through a mixtape of memories, set to the soundtrack of a generation.

En route to their final party together, a perfectly-curated playlist draws them into dreamlike reenactments of their formative memories. Experience a variety of narrative vignettes exploring the pivotal moments that shaped them. It's the greatest hits of teenage friendship, from the first kiss to the last dance.

name: Winter Burrow
description: Winter Burrow is a cozy woodland survival game about a mouse returning home to restore their childhood burrow. Explore, gather resources, craft, knit warm sweaters, bake pies and meet the locals.

name: Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream
description:
Experience an isometric, narrative-driven stealth game set in the stunning city of Eriksholm. When Hanna’s brother, Herman, disappears and the police begin to pursue him, her search sets off a chain of catastrophic events that will not only alter their lives but also the destiny of the entire city. Join your allies, outsmart relentless enemies, and use your cunning to uncover the truth behind Herman’s disappearance — where greater powers are at play than you ever imagined.

Follow Hanna’s adventure through the vibrant streets of Eriksholm, a sprawling Nordic city inspired by the elegance and grit of early 1900s Scandinavia. In this world, every shadow offers a hiding place, and every corner hides a new challenge. Allies and quick reflexes are your greatest tools as you unravel the city's secrets and outsmart your pursuers.

name: Happy Bastards
description: Happy Bastards is an open-world tactical RPG with turn-based combat in which you assemble a squad of unruly mercenaries to explore, fight, and loot. Let the bastards do the dirty work while you give the orders, reap the rewards, and enjoy the high life. Who needs XP when you're famous?

name: Super Crane HD
description: Retro match 3 about a Bug juggling at his job, BUT NOW IT'S BETTER Match 3 drops to clear them, but your tool changes constantly, so watch out! Be a Bug, Do a Work, Match a 3

name: Tiny Lands 2
description: Take your perception into a new dimension with the relaxing sense of photorealistic miniature scenes in Tiny Lands 2. Find the differences and stories by exploring handcrafted 3D dioramas. Can you find them all?

name: Squeakross: Home Squeak Home
description: In Squeakross: Home Squeak Home, solve and transform puzzles into furniture to decorate the perfect home for your rodent friend. Collect hundreds of decorations, accessories and stickers in this cozy game full of charm!

name: Battle Vision Network
description: Battle Vision Network is an online PvP Puzzle-Battler fusing cozy color-matching puzzle gameplay with deep turn-based tactics. Teams from across the galaxy vye for the ultimate championship title in fast n’ fierce puzzle battles!

name: Cairn
description: Reach a summit never climbed before in this survival-climber from the creators of Furi and Haven. Climb anywhere and plan your route carefully, managing pitons and resources to survive the unforgiving Mount Kami. Discover what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the ascent of a lifetime.

name: Tears of Metal
description: Tears of Metal is a medieval hack-and-slash co-op roguelike. Carve through hordes of enemies to reclaim your island with the help of your formidable Scottish battalion. As you advance deeper into the trenches, uncover more about the mysterious Dragon Meteor and the treacherous enemy invasion.

name: Cuffbust
description: Escape prison with your friends by equipping tools, evading guards, and executing your breakout plan. Destructible environments, proximity chat, a multitude of escape routes, and 20 player lobbies!

name: Junxions
description: Build a traffic intersection nobody has ever seen before. Use your wits to manage lanes, rails, crossings, traffic lights, and rights of way. Test it with advanced AI adapting to the rules of the road you decide on. Become a traffic engineer with the most comprehensive road tools in a game to date.

name: Starlit Stories
description: Welcome to Starlit Stories. Relax to calming music as you build and customize your dream campsite. Watch as travelers come and go, adding life to your tranquil retreat. There's no management or deadlines for you to meet. Just wind down and let your creativity flow in this cozy campsite builder.

name: Wild Tactics
description: The Wildest character-driven tactical strategy game you've ever seen! Build your team and maintain their relationships in the war against organized crime. Uncover the conspiracy in the animal-populated city of Clawville, and find the mastermind behind its downfall!

name: Demon Tides
description: Explore the open seas and uncover the kingdom's dark secrets as you expressively platform your way across dozens of locales, upgrading your gear every step of the way!

name: BatteryNote
description: This is an adventure game. You, a mechanic, have picked up three robots from a scrapyard. You can select one of them and charge and converse with them within a time limit. How you treat them will change their reactions, and the ending of the game will change little by little along with their fate.

name: Unbox the Room
description: Unbox the Room is a relaxing puzzle game where you unpack and arrange items and furniture in your new home. Create a cozy space by placing everything just right, from the smallest cup to the largest sofa.

name: Potion Punch Rivals
description: Potion Punch Rivals puts your shopkeeping, potion punching skills to the test. Race against your rival to see who can take orders first, prep fastest, and serve best.

name: Only Way is Down
description: Embark on a purr-fectly perilous adventure as this lil kitty cat took an unfortunate cat-nap and ended up stranded sky high! With no way but down, unleash your feline agility and platforming prowess to navigate your descent through the urban jungle in this whimsical and gravity-defying escapade!

name: The Bell of Time
description: The Bell of Time is an adventure, puzzle and combat game where you'll play a teenager brought to a mysterious mansion. Explore this mansion with its horror-like visual and audio ambience, fight against the supernatural and solve puzzles using never-before-seen mechanics!

name: Ballad of Antara
description:
In a distant land, a mist-like phenomenon devastates the common world with unknown malice. Begin a perilous journey, seek towering, divine creatures, retrieve those twisted and lost ""essences"" of the land.

-Become Emissaries, powerful entities that wield the force of fundamental essences. Experience unique classes, gameplay capabilities, and enticing, mysterious stories.
-Explore the Para, the otherworldly dimension where danger lurks at every corner. Seek the truth inside, and recover the essences of the world.
-Explore handcrafted gameplay space with intricate, exploration oriented level design.

name: Covert Crew
description: A Superpowered SRPG! Covert Crew is a 2D strategic roleplaying game inspired by the classics of old with a modern twist.

name: Comet Angel
description: Comet Angel is a sci-fi visual novel with point and click puzzles. Help the mysterious alien Faerie return home by bringing it the food it needs to fly, and help Izzy and Nat learn to understand themselves and each other.

name: Painted In Blood
description: Trapped in the haunting realm of an artist's twisted nightmare, engage in intense combat with grotesque enemies and monsters, experience unpredictable horror events that unfold dynamically, seamlessly blends classic retro FPS elements with modern elements.

name: journey of Reincarnation
description: 【Reincarnation Roguelike Retro RPG】Battle is fully automatic with no commands! Support the characters who think for themselves and do their best by collecting “Jewel”. Repeatedly reincarnate and aim to conquer dungeons that change their appearance each time you enter them!

name: John Fox
description: John Fox is an elite warrior and super soldier who saved the leaders of various States. He was a professional mercenary who retired with honor. But now his beloved pet, Milo, has been killed. You have to avenge him!

name: Hyperslice
description: Fast paced action arena roguelike where you defeat waves of enemies using your dash. Slice through enemies or push them to survive. Upgrade and buy abilities throughout your run to turn your ship into a killing machine.

name: HyperFatal
description: AIR STRAFE, ROCKET JUMP, and SURF your way through dimensions in this HYPER-intensive skill-based movement shooter of old. The onslaught of foes in your way are invading worlds, and the only way to stop them is to show you will be FATAL.

name: Amerta: The Abandoned Hotel
description: Amerta is a First Person Horror Game. Feel the experience of being trapped into another world. You will act as Maya and try to get out of the unseen world.

name: Piggy One Super Spark
description: PIGGY ONE SUPER SPARK is a single-player action game starring Xiamy, Yuez, and a lost newborn baby they happen to find. Follow the trio in their chaotic but heart-warming adventure!

name: EleBall
description: EleBall is a casual platformer about a circus elephant, who tries their best to catch falling objects while simultaneously keeping balance on a bouncy ball.

name: Sparrow
description: Trapped in a mysterious mansion, a tiny sparrow must survive deadly encounters with horrific creatures as it unravels the mansion's dark secrets and desperately tries to escape. Explore vents, crawlspaces, secret rooms, and more to uncover the gripping story and world of Sparrow.

name: Rusty Flesh
description: Rusty Flesh is a sci-fi horror puzzle platformer for the Game Boy Color where you switch gravity instead of jumping. Explore the different areas of a derelict spaceship putting together all the pieces of its lovecraftian mistery, and enjoy its retro-futuristic aesthetics.

name: Yunyun Syndrome!?: Rhythm Psychosis
description: “Yunyun Syndrome!? Rhythm Psychosis” is a rhythm adventure game about a psychotic hikikomori girl - also an avid anonymous poster - who corrupts the world with her severe brain rot from listening to too many denpa songs. Yunyun all over this world with your degen otaku-posting.

name: Ultra Mushroom
description: Hey! Wanna rise to the top at a festival stall? "Ultra Mushroom" is a high-energy game where you run a mushroom stall at a three-day festival and see how much you can earn. Gather mushrooms in the mountains by day and sell them at night. The key? Rhythmic banter and Ultra Mushrooms that bring joy!

name: Yarn Guardians
description: Yarn Guardians is a 2D Action-Adventure in which you play as cute flying cats that fight enemies with powerful Yarn Balls! Play the story campaign alone or with a friend. You can also challenge up to three friends in the versus mode.

name: Double Whammy
description: Work at a guitar shop by day! Hack and slash interdimensional monsters by night! Uncover the mystery behind Gigi's recurring nightmare! Shred all day all night! Rock 'n Roll 24/7!

name: Leaf Town
description: Leaf Town is a farm management game that includes pigeon racing gameplay elements. Here, you can manage your own ranch town. By purchasing farm buildings, arranging them for optimal effects, exploring and expanding the map, and using pigeon racing items, you can achieve higher profits.

name: Rita
description: Explore, collect, solve, converse, and platform your way as loveable chicklet Rita through this charming word-based puzzle adventure game!

name: Work! Wan Wan Human
description: Work! Wan Wan Human is an [ADV Novel Game of Human Gachi-Inukenka] that educates sinners and turns them into adorable dogs. Become a correctional officer in a city of chaos where humans, demons, and angels are all mixed together and get the job done.

name: Food Devils
description: You're the last chef in a post-apocalyptic world. Attract adventurers with monstrous food, make them sign contracts with the Food Devils and organize expeditions to collect wicked ingredients! Customize your characters, build the perfect restaurant and plan every move in this Strategy-RPG Roguelike.

name: SerialWorld
description: "SerialWorld" is a comedic yet serious RPG. Whether you've played deck-building games before or not, everyone can enjoy this adventurous tale. Embark on a journey into the mysterious world to solve the city's disturbances!

name: Kenoma: Action Without Action
description: Answer the question of mortality in this sidescroller inspired by point-and-click adventures of old. Wander the depths of a world split in two. Confer with gods, locals, and other travelers. Solve problems through intuition and a collection of odd trinkets. Choose: death, or eternal life?

name: Lunarium
description: Lunarium is an atmospheric fantasy A-RPG. Play as Ave, a light-armored knight, who teams up with Lune, a mysterious Starfarer. Together, they journey to save a dying world, engaging in challenging battles to retrieve the lost glow of the stars and forsaken memories, unveiling cosmic secrets.

name: Shield Strike
description: Shield Strike is a competitive game where players use shields as projectiles, in addition to the unique abilities of each of the 8 characters. Made for up to 4 players, VS or Coop, and with a challenging journey in story mode.

name: Under Canopies
description: Under Canopies is a serene exploration and survival experience. Set your own pace as you immerse yourself in activities like building and decorating your cabin, animal husbandry, crafting delicious meals, and uncovering the hidden secrets and valuable resources scattered throughout nature.

name: Total Chaos
description:
Total Chaos is a relentless survival horror experience from Trigger Happy Interactive (creator of Turbo Overkill) and Apogee Entertainment. Washed ashore on Fort Oasis, a long-abandoned mining colony swallowed by decay, players must scavenge for supplies, craft makeshift weapons, and navigate a world where hallucinations warp reality and unspeakable horrors lurk in the shadows.

With dynamic AI-driven enemies, a Madness system that distorts perception, and a brutal fight for survival, Total Chaos pushes the boundaries of psychological horror. Every bullet counts, every wound matters, and your own mind may be your worst enemy.

Prepare to descend into madness—Total Chaos launches in 2025 on PC via Steam, with an optional VR mode for those brave enough to step inside the nightmare.

name: Garten of Banban 8
description: Explore the most obscure levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the new deceives and mysteries that await you. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Stonemachia
description: Stonemachia is an adventure in which you can fight and explore a world distorted by the Plague of angels, taking on the role of Zefiro, a pawn capable of transforming into other chess pieces. Venture into the lands of Medhelan and prepare to face armies of angels transformed into statues and objects inspired by Italian art, architecture, and folklore! Fight with a variety of abilities and precise timing in a parry-centric game, where the shield can truly change the outcome of every encounter! Discover the various transformations and their unique abilities to experience a Dantesque epic and uncover the secret of the chess pieces...

name: Goodnight Universe
description: You are Isaac, a 6-month-old baby, developing mysterious psychic powers. What you want most is to be loved and accepted by your family, but a secretive tech corporation wants you for their own.

name: Velev
description: Dive into VELEV's depths, a hidden world where technology and nature merge. Embark on quests, battle monsters, and unveil mysteries with enhanced gear. Experience intense PvPvE combat, strategic team play across diverse classes, and continuous character growth through exploration and extraction

name: The Case of Andrew D.
description: A forensic challenge - help private eye solve cases for their clients using OSINT and digital forensics techniques.

name: Mohrta
description: Mohrta is a nonlinear FPS game blending action, exploration, and light dungeon crawling. Explore a vast selection of unique environments, slay an enormous cast of otherworldly creatures, and upgrade your arsenal of multifaceted weapons.

name: Jitter
description: Jitter is an immersive sci-fi exploration and survival game set on a mining colony and its outskirts in the Main Asteroid Belt. You assume the role of an experimental AI that maintains ship functions and engages with the crew on board. As you explore the mining colony, you will take on new missions, expand ships and bases using various modules, add survivors to your crew, engage in space fights, and repair the damage left by enemy fire and onboard accidents.

name: Windward Horizon
description: Windward Horizon is an upcoming RPG-adventure set on the high seas, a sequel to the game Windward released on Steam in 2015. Trade, quest, fight, or just sail the world and fish — it’s your choice, and you can do it alone or together with your friends.

name: Onibi
description: Dash, possess, and explore your way through different areas as you accompany a child on their adventures as their fledgling guardian spirit.

name: Morgman
description: MORGMAN is a first-person horror game, a hybrid of classic survival horror and puzzle. You find yourself deep in the forest, in an abandoned mansion with a dark past. You'll need to explore its dark corridors and rooms while staying alive.

name: Ninjam!
description: "Ninjam! is a multiplayer action game for up to 4 players where cute ninja characters move freely and compete against each other on a 3D map."

name: Pie in the Sky
description: Pluck them. Pluck them all. You are an Australian Magpie on a mission. That mission: Spread havoc, cause mayhem, and grab the occasional unattended piece of food. Menace, rob, and terrify humans, enjoying old-school action arcade gameplay rendered in glorious retro PS2 graphics.

name: Only Up: Tiny
description: Only Up: Tiny Is a First-Person Precision Platformer, Your goal is to climb all the way to the top while facing difficult jumps.

name: Icebound
description: In this first-person driving survival simulator, assume the role of a wilderness firefighter on a mission gone wrong. Drive, explore and survive with your snowcat vehicle in an icy environment with a hostile military faction ever present on your tail.

name: Paper Play VR
description: Experience creative minigames as the world's biggest paper playground unfolds right in front of your eyes! We have crazy games, difficult challenges and a heartwarming story for you and your friends, so come and join the party!

name: Bones Beneath
description: Explore the Egyptian underworld in this precision platformer! Jump, whip, and dash your way through a challenging, interconnected world that weaves linear gauntlets with open-ended exploration.

name: Beholder: Conductor
description: A Beholder series spin-off. Become a conductor of the Determination Bringer train: monitor passengers, report incidents, and carry out important Ministry assignments — whose level of secrecy depends only on your loyalty. And remember: mission success is very important to you!

name: Cemitério São Sacramento
description: Live the day to day life of someone who suffers from insomnia and sleep paralysis, do something to pass the time like washing dishes, watching a movie, taking a shower, until you can sleep again… Something “peculiar” might happen in this rented house.

name: Cats Hidden in England
description: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across England in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Cash Cleaner Simulator
description: Start your money laundering business in this chill simulator! Use various not-so-powerful tools to restore dirty money bills and some unusual items to their full, crisp potential! Spend your hard-earned crypto to upgrade and cozy up your lab! The cash is in your hands!

name: Too Small To Matter
description: Journey of animals trying to survive a War. An emotional tale where you'll decide the fate of all who embark on this journey.

name: Tailside: Cozy Cafe Sim
description: A charming RPG where you'll discover the joys of running your own cozy cafe. From brewing the perfect cup of coffee to making friends with the locals, experience a blend of relaxation and adventure during your own coffee break.

name: Meowstery of a Growing Aurora
description: 'Meowstery of a Growing Aurora' is a 2D pixel-art adventure set within the fictional VR-MMORPG Shenanghia, where you step into the shoes of Eleanor, as she has to save her pet cat Aurora from danger lurking within the game.

name: Extinction Rifts
description: Extinction Rifts is a fast-paced FPS where you get stronger as your combo increases! Inspired by classic shooters, you will battle your way through secret enemy headquarters and destroy the Ancient Monoliths with your devastating gauntlet!

name: Dwarven Defense
description: Dwarven Defense is a grid based tower defense game. You build towers during the day and defend against the undead during the night.

name: Aquapark Tycoon
description: Build the ultimate waterpark paradise in this cozy simulation game! Design & customize water slides, pools, and saunas to fulfill your guests' needs. Combine creativity, strategy, and management to make a splash in the world of water parks and become the ultimate Aquapark Tycoon!

name: Break The Line
description:
Rogue elements + Free Layout + Battle Mastery + Turn-based March.
What kind of different experience will it bring? Will you be able to hold on to a tower caught in a tidal wave of enemy attacks? May be the answer you're looking for.

name: SSR Wives: The Murder Of My Winter Crush
description: SSR Wives: The Murder Of My Winter Crush Is an upcoming Retro Survival Horror experience that takes inspiration from iconic staples of the survival horror genre with the charming narrative intrigue of a Visual Novel. Atmospheric exploration, Challenging puzzles, and Horrifying encounters await!

name: Jest Messter
description: Commercial remaster of "The Punniest Pun Messter".

name: Knight of Nevermore
description: Knight of Nevermore is a roguelike action-platformer featuring tight combat and diverse builds. Fight skillfully, platform carefully and equip yourself wisely if you plan to overcome the challenges of Nevermore.

name: King of Retail 2
description: Ready to build another empire? You are once again back in the role as the manager, trying to make the best of a busy store. Find the right things to sell, get the right employees and turn every stone for a profit. Can you handle the pressure or will you buck under? Welcome to King of Retail 2.

name: Gobocore
description: Roguelite Turn Based Auto-Battler about little goblins rescuing their kidnapped tribe members. Smash. Evolve. Survive.

name: Felbound
description: Felbound is a challenging and ruthless roguelike game. Embark on a journey into a mysterious dungeon, facing off against orcs and goblins with a plethora of weapons spells and items!

name: Pool of Madness
description: A retro-styled Lovecraftian pool game with roguelite elements. Shoot some balls. Unleash horrors from beyond. Go insane. Try again.

name: Decadent
description: Decadent is a story-driven FPS combining atmospheric exploration, horror and combat into an immersive experience. Become John Lorn, a Great War veteran turned decadent occultist on a quest to save your lost son and uncover an ancient secret; challenging not only your skills, but your very humanity.

name: Stygian: Outer Gods
description: Dive into a hostile world that challenges your very existence, in this survival horror game with RPG elements. Unravel a thousand-year-old mystery, risk your sanity and face the Outer Gods with your skills. Every bullet and the decision counts now, are you up to the task?

name: Unihorn
description: Cute, funny and with one horn - that is an Unihorn. Welcome to the very first unicorn climbing game!

name: Quantum Beast
description: Quantum Beast is a hardcore sci-fi stylish action fighting game where you need to execute massive crazy robots to save the city. Be sure fully acquiring various skills to pass through those hard battles.

name: Automate It
description: Automate It is a factory building game that requires clever solutions to its size, power, and time constraints. Solve challenges, build and share your own levels, or open things up in sandbox mode. If you want to build it - Automate It.

name: Button Man
description: Button Man is a side-scrolling adventure game set in a fictional Nova Scotia during prohibition. After years of being the henchmen to the local bootlegging kingpin your job now is to find who killed him and protect the town from what’s coming to it. Explore Kingsport and learn the truth!

name: Teo Dove Pro Skater 2
description: Skateboarding game in the spirit of THPS. Perform flip tricks, grabs, grinds. Insane lines. Level up your character and learn new tricks. Find hidden secrets. And challenge your rival to a classic game of skate HORSE!

name: Cursed Dawn
description: Cursed Dawn is a wave survival FPS featuring complex maps packed with secrets, dynamic spawns, and hordes of zombies to turn into gory mulch. Plan your defense, stay on the move, and master the maps. Remember: Nowhere is safe, death is assured, how long can you last until you become zombie chow?.

name: Primland The Magus
description: A dark fantasy 2D action game about a solitary island that has turned into hell and a girl named Magus. Collect "relics" sleeping on the island and acquire skills. Take on mysteries and powerful enemies using a variety of actions!

name: Inkonbini
description: inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a slice-of-life narrative-driven simulation game centered around a small-town convenience store in the early 1990s. Shelve goods, engage in meaningful conversations with your customers, and explore the ways you can impact their lives with your decisions.

name: The Joy of Creation
description:
The classic Five Nights at Freddy’s fan-game returns, rebuilt from the ground up to offer a modern and immersive horror experience with real-time graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5.

The Joy of Creation puts you in the shoes of The Creator, a game developer forced to confront the manifestations of his own mind throughout five unique levels, each with a unique blend of free-roaming and classic sit-and-survive gameplay mechanics.

This game is officially backed by Scott Cawthon as part of the Fazbear Fanverse Initiative.

name: Six Blow: Bullet Rain
description: "Six Blow: Bullet Rain" combines FPS action with living bullet cards. Survive the Wild West, customize your shots, and strategize!

name: Veil of Madness
description: Veil of Madness is a Lovecraftian Deck Builder game that merges the strategic charm of a deck builder with the immersive experience of a first-person RPG genre. Unravel eldritch secrets, battle insanity, and shape your destiny in this chilling journey.

name: Emblems: Sunless Vow
description: Escape the void...and destroy its heart. A collision between three lost souls ends in a surprise trip to purgatory, where vengeful spirits abound. These unlikely friends must uncover the secrets of their past to escape—but can they stop arguing first?

name: Lanista: Shadows and Dust
description: A Tactical Roguelike about the life (and death) of post-apocalyptic gladiators in a dystopian society. Embrace the arena, become the LANISTA!

name: Crime or Punishment
description: Play as a corrupt detective on the mob’s payroll, and cover up their crimes. Read files, collect information and obscure evidence to frame an innocent bystander, who was at the wrong place, at the wrong time. After all, crime pays.

name: Agronom
description: Agronom is a 1st-person farm building simulator in the setting of Slavic popular science fiction. In the role of a robot farmer you will learn how to grow tomatoes and potatoes on Mars and can admire Martian birch trees. Robotize the production and cultivation of foods familiar from childhood!

name: Permanent: Hope & Vacuum
description: Psychological horror, puzzles, platforming, adventure, dungeons, action, intrigue and a touching story are all terms that should be used to try to define the essence of «Permanent: Hope & Vacuum».

name: Dissimilar
description: Dissimilar est un jeu narratif en 2D isométrique, avec une exploration semi-ouverte et des combats stratégiques en tour par tour.

name: Side Kicks! Beyond
description: An expanded port of Side Kicks! for Nintendo Switch, Android, and iOS that will add new episodes to the main story of Side Kicks!, as well as a crossover episode with BUSTAFELLOWS, which is set in the same world.

name: Trizna
description: “Trizna” is a classic plot-driven 2.5D metroidvania filled with intense battles utilizing the unique features of weapons, evasions, parries, and counterattacks. Explore the mysterious and eerie realm deeply intertwined with pagan beliefs, with blade, magic and a keen mind.

name: Moonwakers: Episode 01
description:
Dive into a survival roguelite by taking control of a S.E.E.D, an advanced reconnaissance android! To accomplish your mission, explore exoplanets to determine if they are suitable for humanity.

Thus, you'll need to search for vital elements necessary for life: Carbon, Hydrogen, Nitrogen, Oxygen, Phosphorus, and Sulfur. But beware, danger lurks on this unknown land, and your survival will depend on your ingenuity and skills. Traps abound, and you'll need to strategize to make it through.

Regularly, you'll have to shelter your character to escape ionic storms. Exploration will allow you to acquire new skills and enjoy more autonomy, speed, and gliding. Your biggest challenge? Managing your energy to avoid extinction.

name: Blender Start Here
description: Want to learn Blender but don't know where to start? START HERE!

name: Crackernuts
description: Crackernuts is a narrative game about a goat-headed girl and her sister, a no-bodied head. They are on quest to find themselves and rescue their village from a curse of darkness.

name: Aisla
description: You play as Aisla, a woman who wakes up with no memories in a complex on Mars. Your objective is to explore the environments and discover who the character is and what situation she is in.

name: Cut the Cards
description: Create your own cards in this roguelike deckbuilder by cutting and pasting throughout your deck! Journey to the chasms, fighting off dragons and Boviks alike as you manage scarce resources.

name: Industria II
description: INDUSTRIA 2 is a narrative FPS adventure about a woman stranded in a parallel dimension. Explore, scavenge and fight your way through a mysterious boreal landscape consumed by an ever-hungry artificial intelligence to find a way home.

name: Project Mango
description: Sin descripción

name: Reason Unfound
description: Your brother's unexpected death leads you to unsettling locations in search of floppy disks with cursed retro games.

name: Category 6
description: Brace yourself for the ultimate open-world survival craft experience. Welcome to a world shattered by the relentless fury of the most colossal hurricane in history. You are thrust into the eye of the storm, tasked with not just enduring, but thriving in the aftermath of nature's wrath.

name: Bloom Thrice
description: Embark on a journey through the gamified "Beautiful World", play (fight) with residents until you are satisfied, and explore to the end of the world. "Bloom Thrice" is a 2D action adventure game where you join the world full of brightness and kindness.

name: Last Standing
description: This is an action game in which players compete to defeat the number of enemies that appear from the left and right sides of the screen. The most distinctive feature of the game is the control method, which is innovative and original, like banging on a keyboard.

name: Suspended Animation
description: A sci-fi first person exploration game about a ship in danger, and the evil AI tasked with saving it: you.

name: Watch Out For Goblins!
description: Experience the joy of physics based goblins in their natural habitat! Run, jump, kick and flip your way through a delightful physics sandbox! Explore and collect Power Cogs to become Goblin Royalty! There's no saying what might happen, and no stopping the BIG GOBLIN ENERGY!

name: Stream or Die!
description: Become the greatest streamer of all time in STREAM OR DIE! Embark on your quest for fame by streaming a wild new MMO - where your choices can rocket you to viral glory or comically seal your doom.

name: ChipWits
description: Challenge your brain in this open-ended robot programming puzzle game! Code your ChipWit to navigate logic-twisting puzzles, zap malfunctioning robots, and dominate the global leaderboards. Can you solve Dr. Droog's twisted game and restore order to the space station before it's too late?

name: Sniperbot: The Hype Game
description: SNIPERBOT: THE HYPE GAME is a retro styled, rhythm-based action platformer; It’s Mega Man meets Crypt of the NecroDancer. The player traverses through the cybertech world of Meta Metro. Where Hypebeasts run wild, clout is currency and the only way to survive is attacking your enemies and fighting boss battles with a blaster and sword, all while keeping on beat to a late 80s / early 90s Hip Hop soundtrack!

name: Brave Glin in Fairyaria
description: Brave Glin in Fairyaria is an action-adventure platformer game in the world of Fairyaria, a wonderful fairytale. Play as Brave Glin, a little magical creature that getting lost in a forest, nedding face dangers on the way to return home!

name: Noah's Dilemma
description: Noah, the flood has come. Go search and collect animals that survived. Voyage across the sea to somewhere safe. Be careful though, don't let them kill each other. Noah's Dilemma is a unique Sudoku-inspired strategy roguelike set in a reimagined world of Noah's Ark.

name: Dungeons and Diners
description: Dungeon and Diners: A Culinary Adventure Awaits! Dive into dungeons with your friends, hunting for exotic ingredients to bring back to your bustling diner. Choose to team up with up to 4 players or enlist the help of adventurers for both dungeon delving and diner duties.

name: Bounce Gun
description: Bounce Gun is a challenging arcade roguelike shooter with a huge number of item combinations, unconventional controls and an unusual approach to difficulty progression.

name: Fatal Claw
description: FatalClaw is a high-quality 2D Metroidvania game. Explore the mysterious underworld in your own way with cat “Kisha” who rise from the dead, and find the key to the ground with other survivors through absorbing the power infected enemies.

name: Reggie, His Cousin, Two Scientists and Most Likely the End of the World
description: Control the direction of gravity as you run, jump and explore in an outrageous time-traveling adventure as Reggie, an unlikely hero from the 16,000th century on a mission to save science and ultimately the entire universe!

name: Sealed Bite: Extended
description: Emilia's life turns into chaos as her family members disappear, one by one. Forced to put her trust in a wolf spirit, Emilia sets off to search the land while pressured into feeding a monstrous power. Will the enigmatic figure she encounters offer guidance, or is Emilia diving head-first into peril?

name: Kill the Witch
description: The time when humans gave up being happy to be no longer unhappy and became 'bugs'. The story of a witch who smashes everything with a baseball bat tightly in her hand.

name: Plinio Needs a Hand
description: Guide the father slime, separated from his family across five levels. Use your skills to manipulate boxes and overcome challenges. Solve puzzles, explore, and reunite this unique family in an exciting journey!

name: Collateral Dungeon
description: Collateral Dungeon is a tactical puzzle dungeon crawler. Explore as an archaeologist trapped in your most recent dig: an enemy-infested dungeon. However, you are a lover, not a fighter. Without weapons, you must turn to your wit and clever traps to defeat enemies lest you relive your failings.

name: Potion Shop Simulator
description: Master the art of alchemy in Potion Shop Simulator, a unique blend of simulation and strategy. Brew potions, manage your shop, and cater to a magical clientele in a single-player or co-op experience of the medieval fantasy world.

name: Counter Clash
description: Lead religious zealots, spiritual nomads, or scientific warmongers in a fast-paced, tactical strategy game. Discover different troop combos, counters, and environmental hazards to crush the opposition!

name: Leaf Blowing Simulator
description: Experience the calming tranquility of blowing thousands of leaves around in Leaf Blowing Simulator, the only real-time physics-based simulator that allows you to effortlessly create your own virtual oasis. Shape nature at your own pace and find relaxation in the gentle flow of leaves.

name: Ichorous Moon
description: Run! Race through the corrupted streets of Türme to stop the rising of the Ichorous Moon

name: The Magic World 2: Curse of the Ancients
description: Party role-playing game. You control a squad of characters moving through an open game world. Collect items, complete quests, communicate with NPCs, try to survive, destroy enemies with various magic and weapons.

name: The Raptured
description: The Raptured is a TPS horror survival video game that follows Fletcher in Still Pines, overrun by apparitions that stalk the player. Find out what happened to the town, and try not to be consumed by the treacherous hordes of the apparitions.

name: The War in Chiapas
description: Control a group of young people who enter the jungle of Chiapas, Mexico, in the eighties, to form a guerrilla whose objective is to create an army to overthrow the government through a new revolution, however, a paramilitary group appears unexpectedly.

name: Hanno
description: Join Hanno, an unusual elephant, and Vimal, his newly young companion, as they face challenges brought by…fate? Fight, stealth, explore, sort things out and get ready to uncover the cost of loyalty in this stunning, mysterious, heartfelt action-adventure game.

name: The Sinking City 2
description: The Sinking City 2 is a terrifying Lovecraftian journey, powered by Unreal Engine 5. Experience a heart-pounding survival horror as you explore the flooded city of Arkham and fight eldritch monsters beyond human comprehension.

name: Sleight of Hand
description: Infiltrate a hardboiled, rain-slicked city of taboo, where ritual magic and cursed artefacts set apart those with power from those without. Sleight of Hand is a 3rd-person Stealth-Action Deckbuilder about taking down the coven you used to run with.

name: Korga's Arena
description: We combined a Roguelite Deckbuilder, a Turn-Based RPG, and a bloodthirsty orc battle-mage, to create Qrena! Craft your Deck, enhance your Weapons, and forge your Gladiator Emblem to customize your playstyle.

name: Crab Attack
description: Extraction-lite meets SHMUP. Get more upgrade materials by exploring dangerous places as far as you can go, just be sure to escape before you get pinched or you'll lose everything you've collected.

name: GMH: Good Morning Human!
description: In a synthwave-inspired universe, achieve the best possible scores by avoiding obstacles in your path. Control and skills will be necessary to complete each level.

name: Dating Simulator 2025
description: Dating Simulator 2025 is a dating simulator that offers you the skill of seduction and improving your dating skills. This game allows players to immerse themselves in a world where they can meet, socialize and win the hearts of virtual girls.

name: Terminator: Survivors
description: Play as a survivor in an open world set after Judgment Day where you, alone or in co-op, scavenge resources to build a base of operations for mankind. But you’re not alone. Skynet’s machines hunt you down as well as rival human factions.

name: Endurance Motorsport Series
description: Manage the race from the stands, drive legendary cars and enjoy a genuine endurance race experience. As both driver and engineer, in this unique simulation victory can only come through teamwork.

name: Horse Racing Manager
description: Build your legacy in the horse racing world. Breed the next champion, making key decisions on training the horse and choosing its diet. Every choice counts, and every race tells a story. Create your own rags-to-riches journey, from being a stablehand to owning the greatest racing stable in the game.

name: 9 Kings
description: 9 Kings. 9 cards. 9 tiles. In this pocket roguelike strategy game, you have to build a kingdom powerful enough to withstand the other king's invasions and be crowned the king of kings.

name: TransmuTowers
description: The Kingdom is under attack! Collect resources, build towers, buy upgrades and work alone (or with up to 3 friends) to defend it! Select your favorite Alchemist from a magical coven, and fend off innumerable hordes of beasts in this post-apocalyptic fantasy world.

name: Pokémon Legends: Z-A
description: A new adventure awaits within Lumiose City, where an urban redevelopment plan is underway to shape the city into a place that belongs to both people and Pokémon. Please look forward to seeing it for yourself.​​

name: Duskpunk
description: Dredgeport: a steampunk city spiralling out of control. Gangs roam the slums, and the corpses of the dead are processed for fuel. You’ve escaped the great war, but can you escape starvation? Inspired by the freedom of TTRPGs, explore the city, choose your friends, and shape the city’s future.

name: Faith in Despair
description: Build your own cards, find game-breaking synergies and dominate Satan's army of demons in this roguelike deckbuilder.

name: Red Snow
description: Experience the ultimate fusion of snowboarding and combat in RED SNOW! Navigate perilous slopes, battle enemy forces, and execute stunning tricks to earn cash in this epic board-n-sword adventure.

name: Node
description: N.O.D.E. is a 2.5D puzzle platformer with Timeline-based navigation set in a Cold War era nuclear complex. Plan a route for your robot, strategize, sequence commands and execute them to navigate between checkpoints. Try again. And again. Influence the story with your choices and solve the mystery.

name: Whirlight: No Time To Trip
description: In the heart of Verice Bay, a brilliant idea takes shape in the hands of an eccentric inventor and an eclectic artist. Follow Margaret and Hector in a point-and-click graphic adventure that will take you to the edge of space and time to help them avert imminent danger.

name: Wiblu
description: Wiblu: The Search for the Fire Tea, is a captivating video game with German mythology, following Wiblu's quest to find the legendary Fire Tea to save her sick grandmother.

name: Truxton Extreme
description: Truxton Extreme, which inherits the DNA from legendary arcade masterpiece Truxton, is a collaboration with manga artist and Toaplan alumni Junya Inoue.

name: Exosky
description: ExoSky: Join a whimsical AI cat in a futuristic flight sim. Master stunts in a tech-inspired world with moddable aircraft and realistic physics. Explore beyond Earth in a blend of simulation and imagination. A pilot's dream of skill and creativity.

name: Dolls Nest
description:
Dolls Nest is a 3D action game where you control a mecha girl as she explores the gigantic factory world of Hod on her journey to uncover the truth.
Hod, the world which you inhabit, is a massive crater crawling with armored units. Broken machines and ruined buildings are strewn across its landscape.
But fate can be cruel. You must scavenge the land for resources if you wish to survive in this ruined world.
Make use of the parts and items you find on your journey, and overcome the trials that lie before you.

name: The House of Tesla
description: A brand-new adventure from the creators of The House of Da Vinci. With new handcrafted puzzles, hauntingly beautiful locations and challenges for your brain’s gray (or blue) matter. You will be able to look at the world through the eyes of one of the most famous inventors, Nikola Tesla.

name: Teeto
description: This cute adventure platformer follows a tiny blob named Teeto and his obnoxious bunny companion Nory. Use Teeto’s signature ability of absorbing elements from the environment to fight off the shadow monsters and complete all sorts of challenges for the cast of crazy characters.

name: Fine Work
description: Weave Rhythm and Romance! Charm 7 otherworldly clients with your artisan prowess in this rhythm-infused dating sim.

name: Grand Emprise 2: Portals Apart
description: ⛏️ Survival crafting adventure   Through magical portals   Into fantasy worlds  ⚡ Once-in-a-lifetime, high-paced, high-variety  ⏳ The sequel to Grand Emprise: Time Travel ️

name: Lost Hellden
description: Lost Hellden is a unique 3D hand-painted J-RPG from Artisan Studios, enhanced by dynamic lighting and weather effects. Follow Cyphel and his allies as a mature story unfolds. Customize your characters as you see fit and dive into a battle system that mixes action and strategy.

name: Spirit Guardians
description: Spirit Guardians is a pixel-art roguelike game. A life-and-death battle is unfolding between light and darkness in the spirit realm. Take on the role of the guardian, continually strengthen yourself, and repel the onslaught of the evil spirit legion. Are you ready to embark on this endless journey?

name: Twilight Parade: Moonlit Mononoke
description: Beautiful oni-girls battle hordes of yokai in this side-view bullet hell SHMUP. Every year yokai takes to the streets to celebrate at Hyakki Yagyou, the night parade of the hundred yokai. But this year they didn't invite the oni twins, so they're going to ruin the party!

name: Kira Legends
description: Experience an Action Packed RPG as you slay monsters with mastered sword combat and Unleash Your Inner Dragon abilities as you take on the form of both human and Dragon. Kill off all the Demons as you make your way from your peaceful Hometown to the depths of the Underworld.

name: Decurion
description: Combine the unique abilities of Mechs and Pilots in strategic synergy. Team up with friends in local co-op to conquer dynamic levels with different geometry, shaping your strategic approach. Watch out for anomalies introducing unexpected challenges as you defend your base and strive to stay alive.

name: Master of Ives
description: Join Jennifer and her Ive sisterhood in a quest to restore their roles as muses. Explore the Institute for Vital Energy, uncover potentials, and mend the lost bond between humans and these ethereal inspirers.

name: 100 Cats Belgrade
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Belgrade! Can you find them all?

name: Sunkissed City
description: Sunkissed City is a life-sim set in an upbeat, sun-kissed seaside metropolis full of funky vibes and quirky characters. Stake out your new life in the city, tending to DIY gardens, learning new skills, and making life-long friends and help bring life back to its once-vibrant streets!

name: Blocks for Babies
description: Blocks for Babies is the puzzle-shooter mashup of your dreams. Clear falling blocks by forming complete lines, or go in guns blazing to clean up the board the messy way. Hard and soft drops aren't your only tools anymore—now you have a shotgun.

name: Armored Brigade II
description: Armored Brigade II revolutionizes real-time tactical warfare in 3D, focusing on the intense combined arms combat of the Cold War era, from 1965 to 1991. Boasting a meticulously researched database and huge real-world terrain maps, this game offers an unparalleled combat simulation experience.

name: Algolemeth
description: "Create AI and Conquer the Dungeon." Algolemeth is a dungeon RPG where you send golems equipped with AI (combat logic) into a dungeon for fully automated exploration. Enhance the AI and, through trial and error, aim to conquer the dungeon!

name: Knights of Fresco
description: Raise your own band of Knights and fight beasts from medieval paintings. Knights of Fresco is an open world party building RPG with auto-battling combat that tries to emulate medieval depictions of battles and wars.

name: The Last Winter Knight
description: Haunt a suit of armour. Explore an abandoned castle. Remember your past–and bring an end to the tragedy you uncover in this melancholy yet hopeful visual novel.

name: 1001 Nights
description: This is an AI-native game. Start a journey in the ancient Persian Empire as Shahrzad. Use magic to turn language into reality, collect unique weapons from the tales, and get revenge on the evil King! The fate of the world is yours to rewrite!

name: Goblin Cleanup
description: A co-op cleaning game where you have to clean and rearrange a dungeon before the next adventurers come to complete it again.

name: StarRupture
description: Explore a mysterious planet in an ever-changing open world torn by recurring cataclysms. Build a complex industrial system to extract resources, produce goods and expand your base. Fight against hordes of alien monsters to defend your base and survive, alone or with friends.

name: Steam Trigger
description: A riveting steampunk 2.5D platformer set against the backdrop of the sprawling metropolis. Immerse yourself in a mesmerizing fusion of industrial progress and Victorian aesthetics as you embark on a journey throughout the city.

name: Chocolatio
description: Create and build your own automated chocolate factory. Freely design and expand your factories to deliver a huge variety of chocolate themed resources.

name: Botanica
description: Botanica is a short 2D side scrolling platformer game that immerses you in a world of sentient plants. Join the sprout, whose kind is often regarded as incredibly weak, on a journey to test its strength against Botanica and its governors.

name: Before The Mine
description: Witness the recording of a young individual who, in the 90s, decides to delve into a forest in search of a dark secret in this horror game created with Unreal Engine 5

name: Lilac
description: Lilac is an upcoming visual novel developed by Frontwing about an interspecies academy story between wizards and humans that depicts the “ordinary” within the “extraordinary.”

name: Deep State
description: Deep State, a first person shooter inspired by classic games such as Goldeneye 007, Deus Ex, and Resident Evil.

name: Ritual of Raven
description: Ritual of Raven is a cozy farming game that lets you be creative in a witchy world by empowering you to dip your toes into the magic of coding. You will meet lots of quirky characters that you can befriend and trade with. You will be able to enchant magical creatures to help you grow the ingredients for your spells. And of course you can be creative, decorate your farm and explore the magical world around you.

name: L.OD
description:
A 2D exploration adventure.
The main character, Yoi, receives a letter from his dead sister, Chitose, saying that she wants to tell him a secret.
In order to find out the truth, Yoyi heads to an abandoned laboratory.

name: Earthion
description:
Earthion is an upcoming aftermarket shooting game developed by Ancient primarily for the Sega Mega Drive. Physical MD versions will be published by SUPERDELUXE GAMES in Japan and by Limited Run Games in North America. The game will also get a 16:9 version for modern platforms.

Earthion is published under the label YKGGG, a brand name covering all the retro-style games developed at Ancient. If Earthion meets success, Ancient will go on the venture of releasing video games designed for retro consoles. A separate version of the game for Arcade was confirmed by Ancient and published by exA-Arcadia, which features a new, exclusive mode that will not be available in the Mega Drive version.

name: Moonshire
description: Embark on a journey to save Moonshire as you navigate through a mysterious world filled with dungeons, weapons, upgrades, and fast-paced combat!

name: Kousai Toshi
description: An upcoming kinetic novel by Key and Matsuyama Takeshi.

name: Aeterna Lucis
description: Aeterna Lucis is the highly anticipated sequel to Aeterna Noctis. Following the gameplay steps of the first entry in the series, Aeterna Lucis is a Metroidvania that combines fast-paced combat, a large interconnected map, secret hunting, optional challenges, and a rich and deep story.

name: Pastel Parade
description: Pastel☆Parade is an exhilarating rhythm game with easy controls! Get into the rhythm with cute and pop music!

name: Loopers Plus
description: An expanded version of Loopers with brand-new scenarios and artworks.

name: Nova Hearts
description: A mysterious force of power transforms you and other highly attractive people in your area into superheroes and villains! TEXT, DATE and FIGHT your friends and enemies alike.

name: Soulers
description: Soulers is a Team-Building Twin-Stick Shooter. Assemble a team with time-slowing Protagonist and Colleagues with different abilities, and save the world from invasion of 'Glitch'.

name: WorldShaper Idle
description: A tile-based world-building idle game. Place forests, rocks, mystical flowers and much more. Discover new tiles by experimenting with their placement. Then try to use their bonuses to optimize your production, or just sit back and become more powerful! What will your world look like?

name: Blackthorn Winter
description: You were chosen to break the icy chains that shackle the land! Feel the pulse of Slavic folklore beating in tandem with the thrill of arcade games and the depth of RPG character development. Alone or in pairs, craft skill trees to overcome an ever-changing world where no two adventures are alike.

name: Kitty Cat Combat
description: A unique tactical military simulation RPG that fuses fantasy with modern warfare. Unite under the pawprint banner!

name: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0!
description: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0! is a story-driven game about a young girl exploring the meaning of existence in a corner of the universe, including visual novel, simulation combined with side-scrolling adventure. In this chaotic and disorderly universe, even infinite lives seem so fragile.

name: Eternal Reverie
description: Dive into 'Eternal Reverie,' a team-based roguelike shooter exploring the mysteries of an eternal war. Solo or in co-op, navigate diverse planets, pilot unique ships, and customize with 80+ upgrades. Unveil secrets on branching paths to increase your roster and discover the truths of the universe

name: Crown of greed
description: Ascend to the throne of Rodovia - a mystical realm inspired by Slavic mythology. Engage in an unusual, indirect management system in which you can't issue direct orders and must skillfully bend your subjects and heroes to your will. Perfect your ruling skills to build, expand and secure your legacy.

name: Big Walk
description: Hang out and get lost with close friends in a big world. A cooperative online walker-talker from the creators of Untitled Goose Game.

name: Usual June
description: Hang out, fight monsters, and discover your town’s darkest secrets in Usual June, a third person action game about summer break and the end of the world.

name: Project Chameleon
