description: Project Chameleon is a stealth game where you must shape-shift into objects to go unnoticed by your enemies. Play as Siren, an elite spy executing missions around the globe. Manipulate your surroundings, set traps, and use powerful gadgets in each mission.

name: World of Stickman Classic
description: World of Stickman - classic war strategy with stickman heroes. Collect resources, build your base and hire a powerful army.

name: Within the Unknown
description: Within the Unknown is a first-person, psychological indie horror game where you regain your memory and relive the trauma from your dark past in a sci-fi simulation.

name: The Crimson Maid
description: As a secret celestial curse takes hold of his father, a young cleric finds himself enraptured by the charms of a strikingly beautiful maid. A period drama that combines romance and murder mystery, with a dash of supernatural.

name: The Witch's Bakery
description:
The Witch’s Bakery is a 2D Adventure Puzzle game where you play as a joyful witch who opens a bakery in modern Paris.

She has a special power: she can heal emotions with her bread.

name: Divine Doubt
description:
"I can give you that which you desire most. Your humanity."

This was all that was promised to Callum Röttwell in the mysterious email he received out of the blue one day. It was enough though for him to uproot his life and travel to the city of Starhaven to start anew. As an angel from a small town, he has to adapt quickly and learn how to interact with those he's never encountered before: demons. Especially since he must share a bedroom with one in a cramped apartment. Throughout this journey, Callum will meet many characters, explore the city of Starhaven, and dive deeper into what that strange email entails for him. But he must be wary, for his goddess is watching closely.

name: Renxia
description: This is a challenging action duel game, you will play as an unknown origin of chivalrous expert travel around the ancient Chinese land, to find the former legend of the sword, and gradually solve the mystery of their own origins.

name: Vampire Dynasty
description: Embrace the darkness. Become one with the night. Feast on blood and start a dynasty. Rule as a merciful lord or a ruthless tyrant. Build a beautiful castle, fight and thrive in an open world - either alone or in co-op mode.

name: Summoner of Greats
description: Luis the Mad Painter. His last work, a series of portraits, "The Effects Series". - Is it a prayer or a curse? Over 200 beautifully rendered historical figures and worldviews. Casual real-time strategy with a variety of aspects depending on party combination, training, placement, and terrain.

name: Digested
description: Digested is an open-world horror survival game in which you must evade a giant snake intent on eating you alive. Utilize various tools and abilities to formulate an escape strategy, and use the map to navigate through unfamiliar terrain. Locate your extraction pod and don't get digested.

name: Y2K Directive
description: Will your leadership help your country survive a sci-fi disaster like a zombie plague or an alien invasion? Find out in this unique blend of real time strategy and a brutal (and often unfair) survival wargame!

name: Qi Shen Nong Gui
description: Deception is a female-oriented pixel rpg game set in a hollow female background. In the game, you will play the role of Zhen Wu Si's Tie Rider to move freely in the Jianghu and the imperial court. The sea of bureaucracy is full of changes. The fate of the world is yours to decide.

name: Talis
description: Step into the mythical realm of Northanda as you lead a trio of heroes on a deck-building adventure. Navigate strategic decisions, and harness the combined power of gems, blessings, artifacts, and more. Confront Chaos face-to-face in a world shaped by myth and magic.

name: God For A Day
description: In this 2D, narrative-based simulation game, you play as the Son of God. Your mission: Decide, bless or condemn city residents. Uncover the person's story through their items and secrets before making decisions. Your choices alter the city's destiny, and impact your revelation on Judgment Day.

name: Light In Blood
description: Descending into the world of dreams, you are immersed in the ominous atmosphere of the game "Light In Blood". The game is divided into two teams: victims and executioners. The task of the victims is to survive and get out of the coma, and the executioners are to stop them.

name: HardAF
description: A punishing precision-based, speedrun 2D platformer...in the dark. Uncover the level with every death, earn swag and unlock new chapters. Run, Jump, Dash, Die, Repeat.

name: England in London
description: England in London is a surrealist satirical dark comedy adventure game with an emphasis on atmosphere, characters and mini-games. Featuring weird looking art, hand drawn animation and an ambient score for when you truly want to be left alone.

name: Schrödinger's Call
description: I am Mary. The last person in the world you'll ever talk to. Schrodinger's Call" is an adventure game that uses a mysterious phone to connect with souls who cannot die. The main character, Mary, wakes up in a strange room with no memory. The player, along with the bewildered Mary, will save souls.

name: R-Type Tactics I & II Cosmos: Limited Edition
description: Includes R-Type Tactics I・II Cosmos: Deluxe Edition, 2-Disc Soundtrack, Conceptual Art Card Set (Set of 6), R-9A Arrowhead Acrylic Stand, B-1D Bydo System Alpha Acrylic Stand, Collector's Box

name: Marble Champions
description: Marble Champions is a thrilling marble racing game that will put your skills and reflexes to the ultimate test. Navigate through intricate tracks, overcome obstacles, and rely on your skills to triumph over your rivals. As you advance through the game, you'll discover a trove of unique marbles. Each marble, with its unique appearance and stats, will become your secret weapon for dominating rivals and conquering every track in style. Engage in daily time trials and tournaments to prove yourself against other players.

name: Anemoi
description: An upcoming visual novel from Key.

name: Project Code Kaleido Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Code Neon Mafia
description: Young members of the Mafia fight, rebel, and entrust their hopes to their friends to fight corruption, confront evil, and challenge fate.

name: Keep the Heroes Out
description: An asymmetric, cooperative dungeon defense game for 1-4 players where you play as the monsters protecting their hard earned treasures against invading hordes of looters (so-called heroes) trying to steal it.

name: Monowave
description: Monowave is a whimsical puzzle-adventure platformer about the transformative power of emotions. Explore beautiful landscapes and empathize with its quirky denizens to restore harmony in an emotionally turbulent universe.

name: Dross
description: Dross is an FPS Roguelike set in a derelict facility infested with alien bugs. Travel a procedurally generated world, get powerful weapons and equipment, and upgrade your gear to survive. Fight the Dross, discover and destroy the infestation, and uncover the secrets of this mysterious installation.

name: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution
description: Coinciding with the GBA release, an enhanced version of Shantae Advance is also being released for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Windows PCs.

name: Dice Captain
description: Dice Captain is a thrilling roguelike adventure that invites you to command your own ship and crew. Explore a randomly generated maps, select unique sailors with upgradeable dice, and master the art of tactic with talismans and one-time-use cards. Are you ready to become the ultimate Dice Captain?

name: Milo
description: Survive an onslaught of cult adherents that worship a mysterious beverage

name: Kidbash: Super Legend
description: Kidbash: Super Legend is an exciting 2D platformer that blends classic gaming with a modern touch. You'll go on a thrilling adventure through two different phases - the Mountain and the Village. Your goal is to defeat Tao Shen Long, and begin the journey to becoming a Super Legendary Hero.

name: FUR Squadron Phoenix
description: Embark on an action-packed adventure in this on-rails space shooter. As a trainee pilot, you will fight in strange virtual worlds. Master your ship, upgrade your skills and protect the federation from an imminent threat. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room
description: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room is a community run experimental story game. With the end of the world fast approaching, Dr. Gumphrey Finklestein announces his plans for a groundbreaking scientific experiment. What will it entail? Does even he know?

name: Runehaven
description: Runehaven is a voxel-based atmospheric first-person roguelike dungeon crawler. Explore eerie, procedurally generated dungeons, battle vile creatures, solve puzzles, discover hidden secrets, and dodge deadly traps in your quest for survival!

name: WYzards
description: WYzards is an upcoming multiplayer extraction game with a bit of roguelike. Explore dungeons, use your elemental abilities, and go on insane adventures online!

name: Mainland
description: Enter a cooperative medieval realm, forge alliances, lead armies, and engage in epic battles. Shape history with dynamic politics, or test your mettle against others in fierce player-vs-player combat.

name: Bendy: The Cage
description: Bendy: The Cage is a first person psychological horror game that takes place during the events of Bendy and the Dark Revival. The shadows are closing in. Fight the madness before it's too late.

name: K2: Digital Edition
description: Easy to play, hard to survive. Rush to the summit before weather breaks or set up camps and prepare to push later. Choose the right cards for the right moment. Play turn based strategy with friends, AI or in single player mode. Popular board game adaptation consulted with real K2 climbers.

name: Noumisou Journey
description: A boy, is killed by a killer but resurrected on Halloween. But his brain had been stolen. Confront traps and monsters. Interact with strange inhabitants, solve puzzles, and get your brain back. Dying Game & comical horror. death scene collection feature available. pixel-art exploration adventure.

name: Call of Dookie
description: Imagine you went to the crapper, and emerged an hour later to a monster apocalypse! Retro first-person shooter action inspired by 90's classics! Old-school local deathmatch & co-op for up to 4 players!

name: Soul Blade
description: "Soul Blade" is a 2D platform action game with classic hand-drawn 2D animations that provide a smooth and immersive visual experience. The combat system is built around the "swordplay" mechanism, delivering intense and exhilarating battles.

name: Isolation One
description: Exciting action with puzzle elements and an interesting plot, which takes place on the huge spaceship Transporter P18. In this game, players will encounter an incredible mixture of science fiction and horror. Immerse yourself in a dark world where t you need to survive at any cost.

name: The World Well: Blood of Caro
description: 814 R.E; the war is approaching. In Redimus, the chaotic world where magic, technology, slaves and vampires coexist, a young girl happens upon a magic gun that sets her on a journey of revenge. There is a burning manor behind her, and the road ahead disappears in the jungles of the night...

name: Project Breakout
description: Project Breakout is a sandbox prison escape game, where you and up to three friends are put into a secured facility. Explore the area, train to improve your attributes and gather items, to craft tools that are necessary for your escape!

name: Five Day Detective
description: The Five Day Detective is a point n click whodunnit featuring multiple cases and a twisted sense of humour.

name: FireBall 2
description: Fireball 2 is an elegant and satisfying arcade-survival game about dodging swarms and triggering bombs. Take control of your fireball and weave through the massive flood of enemies. Lure the flood towards bombs and trigger them, either directly or indirectly, to take out as many enemies as possible.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 4
description: An upcoming chapter for Deltarune. It is set to release alongside chapter 3.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 3
description: An upcoming chapter for Deltarune. It is set to release alongside chapter 4.

name: Saborus
description: Saborus is a horror game that puts players in the shoes of Gisele, a chicken escaping from a deadly slaughterhouse. Immerse yourself in a terrifying world with incredible graphics and a chilling atmosphere, where tension and fear await at every turn.

name: Kipidon
description: A colorful shooter that uses a flower as a cupid's arrow. Shoot as many people as you can before time runs out!

name: Treasures of the Haunted Forest
description: Treasures of the Haunted Forest is a fantasy hidden object game, where player's goal is to find alchemical ingredients in the haunted forest.

name: Fat Goblins
description: Prepare for goblin-packed, hat-stealing, and princess-fattening team based 16v16 combat! Siege the castle walls, rescue your pudgy princess, fatten up the enemy princess with delicious meat, unlock new hats & weapons, and kill each other repeatedly in silly and chaotic PvP war!

name: Body Count
description: Embark upon a cop's gripping journey of vengeance through this bullet hell shooter.

name: Clown Meat
description: Clown Meat is a Precision Platformer with an emphasis on speedrunning and replayability. Tumble through a butchered world where humanity is barely a memory on your naïve journey to cheer up the monolithic clown that came from the Depths of Jupiter.

name: The Bugs Manor
description: The Bugs Manor is a free 2D pixel art horror game. Explore a cursed mansion, hide from scary monsters, and solve puzzles with an inventory-free gameplay, focused on direct interactions with the environment. Can you survive your first night in this haunted house and uncover its mysteries?

name: Travel Knight Adventure
description: The Medieval Action Based RPG with guns and magic. Pirates, zombies, wizards and dragons! Catacombs full of treasure and puzzles.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Dungeons of Edirne
description: While being in the Ottoman capital of Edirne, Vlad Voievod Dracula descends into the dungeons to save a great warrior sentenced to death, so he might join Dracula to take the crown of Wallachia. A casual relaxing game, in the Vlad Voievod Dracula franchise, that takes place before Episode 1.

name: Little Problems
description: Little Problems is a Cozy Detective game about solving mysteries around minor inconveniences, everyday misunderstandings, and of course, little problems. This game is not about saving the world; it's about enriching it, one case at a time.

name: Stunt Xpress
description: Become a delivery van driver. The best in the world. Take part in internationally renowned delivery van driving championships. Shoot your parcels (on time) into customer's homes like a marksman while performing gravity-defying stunts and being chased by god knows what.

name: Deep Time
description: Shift dimensions and harness cosmic parkour abilities to solve mind-bending puzzles. Reverse the heat death of the universe in this surreal 3D platformer.

name: Shotgun Recovery
description: A psychological shooter set in a small Nordic town. Take part in robberies, drive-bys and self-medication, all while fighting literal nightmares to survive.

name: Owlet's Embrace
description:
An owlet afraid of flight sets off to explore a vibrant mysterious world and rediscover itself. On this heartwarming adventure, you'll confront the owlet's deepest fears as only the greatest challenges can lead to the most profound growth.

Owlet's Embrace is an action exploration platformer, blending fast paced grappling hook manouvers with combat and emotional discovery.

name: Playdle
description: Sin descripción

name: Calm Cove
description: Build your dream island, bring it to life and make it flourish. Create nature, establish settlements and welcome villagers while watching your own miniature world thrive before your eyes!

name: Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream
description: Teenagers, Dreams, and Drugs. Unveil the secrets of South Jayakarta city, set two years after the ending of the original Troublemaker. The journey of the “Parakacuk” gang continues alongside the “Beyond Dream” band in South Jayakarta city in this fun open-world action-comedy beat-'em-up game.

name: Music Power Up
description: As a musician in the 1980s, create music for early video games. Make your own sounds and melodies from scratch, or use pre-composed patterns. Play games, upgrade the music app, meet programmers, editors and musicians, find your next music job, in the crazy decade that started the digital revolution.

name: The Phantom
description: The Ghost Who Walks is back! Comics' very first costumed hero is coming to Steam and console in an all new side scrolling beat-em-up adventure. Take on the Singh brotherhood across the globe with only your physical strength, skill with weapons and fearsome reputation!

name: Bean Beasts
description: Defeat monster hordes alongside your Bean Beasts in this cute, challenging Tower Defense Game! Evolve your companions, explore upgrade paths for traps and take on epic boss battles!

name: Morgan: Metal Detective
description: A cozy, first person metal detector adventure game, where you reunite residents of the beautiful Cornish island of Glasden with things they have lost. And with your late Grandpa's help, maybe restore magic along the way.

name: Power Line Rider
description: Power Line Rider is an Action-Packed Endless Runner with retro 8-bit inspired graphics & sounds! Dodge Birds, Squirrels, Monkeys and Fight Bosses as you race across a post-apocalyptic world where the fastest means of travel is riding on old Power Lines!

name: Codename Incubus
description: Slice, dash, and parry your way through your inner demons in this fast-paced psychedelic journey! Dodge an onslaught of deadly projectiles and unleash your blade upon nightmarish foes that lurk within your subconscious. Follow a dissident dealer and a jaded philanderer on their never-ending trip.

name: Sticker Kittens
description: Sticker Kittens is a sudoku-like puzzle where you need to match kittens. You can also learn about how to raise and play with kittens!

name: The Bunny Graveyard: Chapter 2 - Terror in Carrot Town
description:
Terror in Carrot Town is the working title for Chapter 2 of the horror adventure game, The Bunny Graveyard.

Chapter 2 has started development and will follow Skye the Bunny with a different moveset and more gameplay options then the previous chapter. Plans are for the story to get darker but still have wacky moments and fun minigames throughout a more connected world map with a less linear path through the story.

name: Pirates Odyssey
description: Ahoy, mateys! We are marooned on a series of islands and need to find a way home. Help us explore the environment, build camps and find glorious booty. Join us on an island hopping adventure full of parrot wisdom, pirate mayhem and puzzle glory! Arrr!

name: Pixel Piracy Online
description: Pirate MMO RPG that has it all. You will play alone or with friends any way you want: build the world, gather resources, farm, socialize, pillage, level up, min-max, loot, craft, survive, etc. One big dynamic, persistent world.

name: Exploration: Light
description: Experience large space ship battles. Uncover the secrets of the mysterious alien race. Upgrade your ship or even start a fleet. Survive

name: Lost Isle
description: Lost Isle is an open-world survival game set in a procedurally generated fantasy world. Build and protect or siege and plunder. Harvest and craft or explore and loot. Whether you decide to go it alone or forge an alliance with other players, the Lost Isle is yours to take–and lose–as you see fit.

name: Dark Decline
description: Dark Decline is a horror game about exploring the town you live in to figure out what happened to everyone. Play against unique enemies that will do whatever it takes to stop you.

name: Lea
description: In a world of miracles and challenges, where steam technology meets magic on a vast archipelago continent, you become Lea, an ace pilot. Your mission: conquer enemies, unveil conspiracies, and bring peace. Are you ready to be the hero who stops the war?

name: Shadows of the Afterland
description:
Madrid, 1960. The old city zoo is rocked by a mysterious death, catapulting a soul to the threshold between the world of the living and the afterlife. But when the transition goes awry, the soul arrives with the memories of Carolina, one of the pioneers in Madrid's police force, who has yet to be born.

Step into Carolina’s shoes and plunge into a riveting adventure to unravel the enigma shrouding these ominous events. Explore the wacky realm of the afterlife, teeming with unique characters and with its own set of rules.

name: Memory Rewind
description: Explore the thrilling detective visual novel adventure with your assistant Olivina. Find your way through the bizarre case that pulling you into unique investigation gameplay and meet the colorful cast of memorable characters that can help you or endanger you

name: The Diner at the End of the Galaxy
description: Build your diner. Grow exotic ingredients and create a menu for your intergalactic guests. Send expeditions to outer worlds in search of loot. Form alliances and rivalries with powerful factions and shape the fate of the galaxy. Welcome to the Diner at the End of the Galaxy.

name: Infernae
description: Fear is not a shield. Only those who face it will survive this adrenaline-pumping bullet hell boss rush.

name: OhMyWitch!
description:
It is the first year I have had the chance to join the Halloween parade. But why the monster kidnapped me to the other world?! And this charming monster wants me to be his Witch. What do you think I should do?!

On the other hand, I also met the cat I lost. But why did he suddenly become a human?!

name: Heart Cage
description:
You are a detective who has just moved to a new town. You are involved in a serial killer case, and three mysterious residents (Or more?!) are approaching you!

Don't trust anyone! But... can you?

name: Kiyo
description: Sneak, fight and sabotage an evil bunny corporation in this stealthy platformer. Join a resistance group of animals trying to get their home planet back from the paws of evil rabbits. Master stealth, swing with ninja ropes, crack tricky puzzles and enjoy satirical humour!

name: Crystal Journey: Lum's Adventure
description: Crystal Journey - Lum's Adventure is a captivating 3D puzzle/adventure game where your goal is to guide Lum, a brave light spirit, through a world filled with challenging puzzles and stunning environments. Rotate the levels, think creatively, and solve intricate puzzles to reach the magical purple crystal that hold the key to Lum's journey.

name: Amp
description: Dive into the synesthetic world of Amp, the neon rail shooter set in a polygonal rhythmic universe.

name: The Scramble Vice
description: It is the year 2048. Tokyo Police Department’s notorious 9th Mobile Unit, “The Scramble Vice” is ready to fight high-tech robot crime! Clad in an armed exoskeleton suit, police officer Sakuragi Kei of the 9th unit stands to fight robot crimes within Neo Tokyo! Are you ready to scramble up Tokyo?

name: Geno 2 the Generals' Orders
description: Take out demonic generals that have taken over the planet! Destroy giga robots, save the cities, give the citizens their homes back, and stop the reign of terror from the 6 masterminds. Collect power orbs to unlock new areas and explore the open world of each location.

name: Rubinite
description: "Rubinite" is a dark fantasy boss rush action game that utilizes the unique mechanic "Focus" to pinpoint enemies' weaknesses and execute thrust attacks. Follow Ruby, a princess who has escaped from the Scarlet Kingdom, embarking on a journey of revenge to reclaim her kingdom.

name: B.U.D.D.
description: B.U.D.D. is a cute sci-fi adventure platformer heavily inspired by games and anime from the late 80's.

name: Hollow Home
description: Hollow Home is an isometric narrative RPG about the russian invasion of Ukraine, told from the perspective of a teenager trapped inside an occupied city. Learn survival skills, build relationships and face tough choices as each passing day brings new tragedies and destruction to your childhood home.

name: Elemdian
description: RPG that combines exploration with magic combat. Unfurl your claws as a powerful werewolf warrior wielding the power of the Elegems! A journey to find the Elegems, unleash devastating spells, and unravel the mysteries of Morrok.

name: Tom the Postgirl
description: Take a ride with Tom through her village and discover a great deal—perhaps too much—about the locals. Her approach, although controversial, is highly effective: intense and obsessive stalking.

name: Mayhem Brawler II: Best of Both Worlds
description: A perfect fuse of '90s arcade vibe and modern rogue-lite / RPG mechanics in a time transition-themed beat 'em up. Play solo or online with friends and shape the story through your choices. Be amazed by the hand-drawn comics-inspired art, frame-by-frame animated characters, and kick-ass soundtracks.

name: Parkside: Decayed Soul Manipulation
description: Parkside is an FPS-Immersive Sim that chronicles the future of biomechanical subterfuge and suffering. Shoot, hack, and either save or sour the future of humanity in the dismally attractive and dystopian city of Abbotsford, California in the awful year of 2038. Will you serve the Divine Rod?

name: Noga
description: Noga is a single-player shooter/driver, RPG, where an alien invasion of Earth has just begun. As you try to save your friend from the hands of the aliens, you uncover the real reason that brought them to Earth.

name: Fishing Echoes
description: Step into the cozy realms of Fishing Echoes, a game that beckons you to shorelines filled with rare fish and whispered legends. Ready yourself for the ultimate angling challenge as you embark on a journey to mastery.

name: Dark Auction: Hitler's Estate
description: The game is a mystery adventure centering on the idea of a historical figure having surreptitiously bequeathed a fictitious estate, following the drama that plays out among the characters faced with an enigma extending all the way into their modern world.

name: Exelio
description: In "Exelio," you'll face an ever-changing environment and various threats while acquiring the knowledge and skills needed to survive in uncharted lands. Explore a world where beautiful nature and harsh realities collide, and delve into its mysteries as you carve out your own fate.

name: Archetype Blue
description: Archetype Blue is a rogue-lite deck building game where you form your own adventure team and deck before facing the challenges this fantasy world has in store for you. With all the options in front of you and the circumstances surrounding your expedition, do you have any chance of succeeding?

name: Alpine Lake
description: Kick back in the fresh mountain air and craft your ideal haven on the shores of Alpine Lake! Build, and decorate your inn to bring joy and prosperity to the community. Welcome guests to your cozy escape in the woods. Farm, cook, and entertain them in your own unique way!

name: On a Summer Night
description: "Today, I would like to tell you about one night. One night that changed my life." On a Summer Night is a short point-and-click visual novel.

name: Animaloid Girl
description: The story of a girl who is changing from a human to a "Kemono" and watching her coming of age. This is a multi-ending "adventure game about training an Animalized girl" set in a Kemomimi x Hong Kong x cyberpunk world.

name: Little Cheese Works
description: This is a cooperative action game where you have to carry cheese to the goal without being found by cats. You can have a conversation with voice chat, but the slightest noise will wake up the cat. Let's carry the cheese quietly by breathing quietly so that the cat won't find it!

name: Toree Saturn
description: Toree Saturn is a speed based 3D Platformer featuring a round bird with sunglasses and a backpack!

name: Million Depth
description: Embark on an adventure, exploring a million subterranean floors of a fallen Earth.Trace the remnants of humanity that once dwelled below, all in search of "YOU".Utilize a crafting system that transforms your drawings into weapons to survive the challenging underground world.

name: Dissent on Mars
description: A sci-fi life sim where you create new societies unlike anything on Earth. Design your economy and government, build your colony, and experience your choices firsthand by living as a colonist. Will your society become a living utopia, or another dystopia?

name: Janet DeMornay is a Slumlord (and a witch)
description: Live the anxieties and horrors of what it is to be a renter in a world run by landlords. …and your landlord is a witch.

name: Ghost of Catsushina
description: Ghost of Catsushina - is an action-adventure platformer. The action takes place on the island, when damage penetrates into the jade dream of the guardian spirit, the warrior awakens and sees that his homeland has been destroyed. Set out on a journey to defeat the filth.

name: Tormented Souls II
description: Caroline Walker is back in an award-winning classic survival horror sequel. Explore eerie monasteries and other nightmarish locations. Brace yourself, confront terrifying creatures armed only with makeshift weapons as you desperately try to rescue your cursed sister.

name: Hexxen: Hunters
description: Lead a party of 18th century Hunters against the forces of Hell in this turn-based tactical RPG. Manage your base of operations, train your team of Witch Hunters, and fight to save the world from certain doom.

name: Menace
description: Lead a strike force against an alien threat in this turn-based tactical RPG from the developers of Battle Brothers. Answer distress calls across different worlds, train and equip infantry, deploy tanks and mechs, and plan and execute missions in detailed turn-based battles.

name: Little Nightmares III
description:
Embark on a new adventure in the unique world of Little Nightmares.

In Little Nightmares III, you follow the journey of Low & Alone, as they search for a path that could lead them out of the Nowhere.

Trapped within the Spiral, a cluster of disturbing places, the two friends will have to work together to survive in a dangerous world full of delusions and escape the grasp of an even greater threat lurking in the shadows.

For the first time in the franchise, face your childhood fears together with a friend using online co-op, or solo with an AI companion.

name: To the Grave: The Battle for Faenora
description: Delve into the captivating realm of Faenora in our upcoming real-time strategy RPG game, To the Grave: The Battle for Faenora. Drawing inspiration from timeless classics like Final Fantasy Tactics and Ogre Battle, we're modernizing the elements that made these games unforgettable.

name: Beneath the Bleeding Moon
description: A boys' love / yaoi visual novel set in 19th century Japan. Follow the adventures of Haru, an aloof young man forced to crossdress by his mother from childhood, and Kishou, a cheerful and irreverent thief brought up in poverty, as they travel across the country to break an age-old curse.

name: Dead Wells: The Devil Fragment
description: Hack, Slash, Parry and Dodge your foes in this Souls-like Action RPG. Explore the countryside in search of The Devil Fragment while fighting enemies with a multi game inspired combat system where you can launch foes into the air and then juggle them to build your combo meter for multiple buffs.

name: Quantum Cortex
description: Quantum Cortex is a fast-paced, physics-based metroidvania. Tear through a dark, atmospheric environment at lightning speeds and battle terrifying creatures. Discover the eldritch mystery behind civilization’s fall, and rise up against the transhumanist dystopia that took its place.

name: Psychotic Bathtub
description: Psychotic Bathtub deals with Ophelia’s psychotic disorder in her bathtub: Argue with your rubber duck, add bathwater. Your interactions may lead to death, great joy, or worse: Your duck drowns, the bathroom is flooded. Will you find a way out of the really scary parts of your mind? Maybe not.

name: Spirit X Strike
description: An Action Adventure Game that lets you craft unique COMBOs and explore endless ways to style on your enemies with a high-speed combat system. Test your skills in fun chaotic one-vs-group battles, intense, strategic duels, and exhilarating post-apocalyptic adventure that will set your blood boiling.

name: Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
description: Lessaria is a unique strategy game that combines city building with indirect hero control. Build and manage a thriving kingdom while issuing commands and quests to guide your heroes in their adventures. Explore, conquer, and shape the destiny of your realm in this epic fantasy world.

name: Ardaria
description: Procedural building, crafting, RPG skills, resource mining, and dynamic NPCs. Master parkour moves, face hordes of enemies, and tame powerful mounts! Embark on an epic adventure in Ardaria!

name: Corpse Party II: Darkness Distortion
description: Corpse Party II: Darkness Distortion follows three high school friends; Haruka Nanami, Nemu Takanashi, and Maria Hitsugi, as they explore the Amare Est Vivere Hospital, testing a local urban legend as the streamer Nemu seeks to boost her subscriber count. Unfortunately for the three girls, the legend of “Ayame’s Mercy” is true, and they trigger a decades-old curse that sends them into a dark realm. Together they must avoid the vengeful spirit of Ayame Kirishima and other horrors from the hospital’s dark past as they search for a way to dispel Ayame’s curse once and for all.

name: Divine Guardian
description: Explore the enchanted Vietnamese jungle, combat mystical monsters, and rescue creatures on your quest to challenge the gods and restore harmony to the Universe as the DIVINE GUARDIAN, immerse yourself in an epic 2D hand-drawn refreshing adventure.

name: Detective Gatuma: Get a Clue!
description: Detective Gatuma: Get a Clue! is an upcoming non-linear investigative visual novel where the player, with each mission, must interview witnesses, gather evidence, and find contradictions in the suspects' testimonies to find out who the real culprit is.

name: SoulQuest
description: Carve your path through hordes of enemies, defying the gods to seize the power of Morrigan, Goddess of Death, and retrieve the soul of your beloved! SoulQuest combines the evergreen Metroidvania gameplay with the unique Celtic mythology into one, action-packed mixture!

name: Starfall Invaders
description: Embark on a roguelike shooting game set in a mysterious world that combines 2D and 3D elements. Survive and escape from an unknown planet. Utilize enemy resources to enhance yourself, repair your damaged spaceship, and prepare for increasingly powerful and numerous enemy forces.

name: Projected Dreams
description: Drag toys from the shelves and drop them on the table to create a shadow play in this cozy puzzle game. As the shadows you cast uncover past family relationships and the environment around you changes and evolves, the lines between reality and fantasy blur.

name: Dragonscale Monastery
description: Tame the mountain peak and create a dragon sanctuary. Carefully expand your monastery and discover the secrets of dragon breeding. Survive harsh winters, limited resources, hunger, cold, and many other adversities. Experience unique survival city-builder in the world of Dragonscale Monastery.

name: Water Me & You
description: Water Me & You is a cozy two-player co-op adventure in which you play as a water droplet or a seed-like creature that can change states, on a quest to regenerate a world left behind by humans.

name: Soul Devourer
description: Soul Devourer is a metroidvania action-platformer with a classic 2D horror style. You'll explore the vast, cursed Sakuradoki High School, master unique abilities, fight twisted monsters and uncover the long-buried secrets concealed under the school.

name: Primal Carnage: Evolution
description: Primal Carnage: Evolution builds on the bones of what came before, taking dinosaur versus human combat to the next level. Featuring an expanded roster of prehistoric playables, evolved gameplay, and a wealth of brand new content to sink your teeth into.

name: Ratatan
description: Ratata Arts and TVT have announced Ratatan, a new rhythm action game from the creator of Patapon previously teased as Project JabberWocky.

name: Recycle Bin Battle
description: Reycle Bin Battle is an arcade puzzle game based on 3 differents gameplay. Make combo with rubishes to make ball, use ball in a breakout to get energy and finally use energy to shoot Kaiju coming from outer space.

name: Sylvana's Chronicles
description: A turn-based strategy game with roguelike and deck-building elements. Explore a dark and magical world full of forgotten lands, monsters, and secrets. Build your own deck of cards to fight your way through the dungeons. Upgrade your cards, unlock new items, and discover ancient artifacts.

name: Wish Upon a Llama
description: Embark on a delightful journey of breeding and raising adorable animals like llamas, bunnies, and capybaras while building meaningful relationships with the residents of Llama Town. What unique animal breeds will you discover and whom among the townsfolk will you befriend? Adventure awaits!

name: Constance
description: Constance is a 2D hand-drawn action adventure featuring a paintbrush-wielding artist, striving to escape from a colorful but decaying inner-world, created by her declining mental health.

name: Panchin is Frustrated
description:
You are the all-seeing observer of a pair of roommates, Panchin and Julem. Panchin is an artist struggling with creative block, and thus spends most of their time pacing around the room, or staying distracted.

Click to collect Panchin's Tears of Frustration. The amount of Tears collected during the day affects Panchin's dreams at night.

name: Saeko: Giantess Dating Sim
description: You opened your eyes to find a giant girl looking down at you. Experience the fate of Saeko and the little people in this cruel yet captivating story with avant-garde art.

name: System Purge: Hollow Point
description: Faced with a horrifying tragedy, you must delve into a flowering realm of memories and nightmares to save your dead lover. SYSTEM PURGE - Hollow Point is a massive expansion which adds a surreal new campaign, challenging new gamemodes, and more.

name: Eydigard
description: Eydigard is a coop RPG drawing from Scandinavian and Sami folklore. As an adventuring shapeshifter, you're tasked to reclaim and cleanse farmlands infected by a relentless plague, while navigating the intricate politics of rival clans. Each decision impacts your path and the world around you.

name: Milord
description: Milord is a Kingdom Management RPG game with city building mechanics. You'll be left with hard choices for your fiefdom. Will you be able to rise to the occasion or lose your kingdom and life in the process.

name: Tales of Wakana
description: "Tales of Wakana" is a thrilling action-adventure game like Galaxy Castlevania. Explore a mysterious and challenging world, battling monsters using magical skills. Uncover the true meaning of life, family bonds, and self-knowledge for an enlightening experience.

name: Heroes Suck
description: Defend your dungeon against an onslaught of heroes in this physics-enabled tower defense. Build your dungeon tile by tile, placing deadly traps to protect your loot. Upgrade your defenses and powers as you amass wealth and unleash havoc on these cheese wheel-stealing 'heroes'.

name: Bobo Bay
description: Bobo Bay is a pet simulation game where you collect, mash(breed), accessorize, and train little creatures to compete in races and other competitions. You are able to feed your Bobo an old shoe which is kinda funny.

name: RaidKids
description: Still, the boy keeps walking.

name: Cyber Paradise
description: Revive Mini the Dog digitally through 2D roguelite actions; craft her cyber paradise with beloved moments, like sniffing dog butts XD. Uncover a deeper dystopian narrative and strengthen friendships in cafe chats—a frenetic yet cozy journey.

name: Relic Guardian
description: "Relic Guardian" is a fantasy-style strategy tower defense game. As the builder on the battlefield, summon a variety of defense towers and spells with reliable hero companions to complete this epic and guarding adventure!

name: Tales of the Laser Knights
description: Zak needs to save the galaxy! Explore all 5 known planets, upgrade your Laser Katana, learn how to fight the evil ... and go on an intergalactic adventure, in this sci-fi b-movie Action-RPG!

name: Sky Harvest
description: Sky Harvest is an Open World Farming Game set in a fantasy town named Magica where you play as Zacharias whose goal is to manage the farm on a floating island and supply the crops in the City below.

name: The One Who Stands Behind
description: Survive hordes of monsters in a deck builder with a tactical grid while engaging in existential conversations with your avatar.

name: Rebirth of Arcadia
description: Rebirth of Arcadia is a turn-based tactics game with roguelike elements and contemplative story. Experience the journey of two groups of people working together to escape from the Abyss. Explore, defeat monsters, wield and modify the power of runestones to uncover the secrets of the Abyss.

name: Zehlar
description: Explore a world full of secrets and magic, inhabited by creatures with unique elemental abilities. Ally with them to embark on your adventure, and train alongside your creature companions to become stronger and conquer the challenges of the world.

name: Golembert
description: Golembert is a beautifully illustrated story game about a Gardener Golem that takes care of the plants and spirits on his own small island. Manage the needs of your plants within a circular economy, grow fresh veggies, barter them with your friends and be ready for an adventure! Are there other Levighosts out there like Helio? How is the Great War related to your garden? And what about the cutthroat Trade Co. that makes life difficult for Frieda? Meet lovable characters, decorate your garden and make the world a better place through your choices!

name: Crown Gambit
description: Choose the next sovereign in this dark fantasy game, featuring card battles and visual novel-like dialogues with multiple endings. Play your cards well, use your skills with care, and move carefully in these turn-based battles, where the weak rely on luck and the Heroes on their talent.

name: Death the Guitar
description: "Death the Guitar" is a pop and violent 2D Platformer action game. The player is a killer electric guitar whose owner was murdered, and the goal is to take revenge on the humans by manipulating "sound" and "electricity".

name: Operation Octo
description: Dr. Odin, a hyper-intelligent octopus, is on a conquest against sunken skeletons. High-tech turrets are at his aid: Pistol Shrimp! Navy Seal! Death Ray! Deploy 'em, guard 'em, and collect more of 'em! Travel across unique biomes and put the dead to rest.

name: Specters of the Sun
description: Specters of the Sun is a challenging 2D action platformer with action-packed levels. Take on the role of an elusive specter to reclaim your old corpse, now possessed at the heights of your former kingdom.

name: Gex Trilogy
description: Gex Trilogy is the definitive edition of the classic platforming series with Gexcessive attitude, complete with Gextras like rewind and save anywhere. Relive Gex's snark-laced adventures through the warped lens of twentieth-century pop culture and use your Gexterity to survive an onslaught of television-themed challenges.

name: Sky the Scraper
description: This is a building cleaning Roguelike action game, about a young man named Sky, who chases uncertain dreams as a building cleaner. Conquer thrilling randomly changing high-rise stages, upgrade skills and gear with your money and will, and find your path within a two-month limit.

name: Tales from My Ass: Slice of Death
description: My first-person horror adventure about the night I delivered a pizza to a haunted manor full of deadly traps, knife-wielding cultists, and lots of gore. This all actually happened to me. How it all ended will shock you the most!

name: Coraland: The Worst Rescuer
description: Coraland is a puzzle adventure game where we follow Joris, a good for nothing rescuer on her first adventure to save Pon-Pon island from imminent danger. The controls are simple and the puzzles have been designed to be accessible for all ages, without outside knowledge to solve them.

name: A Simple Expurriment
description: A 2D platformer with puzzles, exploration and genetically modified cats. Help the cat mom search an alien ship for her missing kittens by doing typical, not-so-typical and definitely atypical cat things: run walls up and down, turn to liquid and rearrange parts of the ship like pieces of a puzzle.

name: Chimera Custom XG
description: Dive deep into mysterious alien facilities, hidden structures, and ancient sites all over the planet. Overcome technologically advanced defenses, deadly forces, and cunning traps. Be wary of what you uncover, as the most dangerous thing you may find is the truth!

name: Survivter
description: Survivter is a roguelike first-person shooter where you no longer have to press a button to make your weapon fire, it shoots itself as long as there are enemies in the room. The gameplay consists of dodging enemies and upgrade character.

name: TD Royale
description: TD Royale is a real-time multiplayer tower defense where you summon enemies for your opponents. Balance economy and offense without letting your own defenses fail in order to outwit your enemy and be the last summoner standing!

name: Riversiders
description: Raft down the river, camp in the wild, and make friends!

name: Vegangsters
description: A 2D roguelike that brings deckbuilding games to the next level! Set in a world full of crime, you will take control of a potato inspector that uses cards to arrest criminal vegetables.

name: Pneumata VR
description: VR version of Pneumata!

name: A.I.L.A
description: A.I.L.A. is a first-person horror game set in a near-future filled with immersive technology. Play as the sole game tester for a revolutionary new fictional AI. Survive intense horror experiences that prey on your deepest fears as the lines between virtual and reality begin to blur…

name: Nova Roma
description: The glory of Rome is at your fingertips in this city-building game where you must appease the gods, enact laws, and develop complex supply chains to meet the needs of your citizens.

name: Surviving Deponia
description: Explore, craft, build and fight your way through the harsh landscape of Deponia. Meet allies and make enemies while surviving the perils of the junk planet. It might be garbage - but it’s your garbage!

name: Steel Seed
description: Steel Seed is a single player stealth-action adventure game set in a dark sci-fi world. In her epic journey inside a hostile underground facility run by AIs, Zoe is alone with Koby, a flying drone, as her only companion.

name: Tall Trails
description: Tall Trails is a chill exploration game. You play as Alp, an indestructible little golem on a quest to find his purpose. With your trusty Rocket Boot strapped to your back, you'll summit towering peaks, scale mysterious megastructures, and meet strange little guys!

name: Angeline Era
description:
Bump the World! A fast-paced, nonlinear, 3D Bumpslash Action-Adventure with intense boss fights! Venture into an ancient land of Angels and Fae, as you slash and shoot through a lush world filled with outrageous hazards, charming creatures, and unholy abominations. By the creators of Anodyne 2 and Sephonie.

Bump into enemies to automatically attack--no attack button needed! This fast-paced and athletic combat experience is easy to pick up, but difficult to master. Intense boss fights will test your skills!

Explore the nonlinear overworld however you’d like. Challenging, ancient ruins sit near quiet forests, each filled with outrageous hazards, charming creatures, and unholy abominations.

Hunt down the beings who plague the esoteric land of Era. Within an intertwined history of Angels, Humans, and Fae, seek the truth of Angeline Era!

name: Baby Steps
description: Play as Nate, an unemployed failson with nothing going for him, until one day he discovers a power he never knew he had… putting one foot in front of the other. Explore a world shrouded in mist, one step at a time. Hike the serene mountains by placing each footstep yourself, in original physics-based gameplay from the minds behind Ape Out and Getting Over It. Take in the sights, fall in love with the local fauna, and try to find meaning in a wasted life.

name: Bye Sweet Carole
description: Bye Sweet Carole is a horrific thriller game inspired by the greatest animation movies and created by Chris Darril. (Remothered series) Be ready to jump into the world of Corolla and meet the rabbits that has infested it.

name: Light Odyssey
description: You will journey to reclaim the light of a fallen world, and in the ruins of an ancient civilization you will confront the Colossus. Their power might be overwhelming but trust the fading light guide and restore you during this Light Odyssey.

name: Dunk Dunk
description: Dunk with or on your friends in Dunk Dunk, a multiplayer action basketball arcade party game full of chaotic fun. Familiar platforming controls plus unique stretchy arm controls make for nail-bitingly tough matches. Dress up your dunker and get ready to dunk across the universe!

name: Parcel Simulator
description: Inspect and dissect parcels and packages in this parcel inspection simulator! Examine labels for mistakes, contents for contraband and hone your parcel reviewing skills. Build, upgrade and expand your warehouse to take your parcel inspections to the next level!

name: SWAT Commander: Prologue
description:
The FREE PROLOGUE version of our tactical squad shooter. In SWAT Commander you take charge of an elite special forces unit. Issue orders to your SWAT team, manage its members and their equipment, but most importantly – complete your mission successfully.

SWAT Commander: Prologue is the FREE prologue version of the upcoming team tactical shooter and does not reflect the final version of the game.

name: April '86
description: April ‘86 - is a mystical first-person thriller which has our protagonist journeying to the abandoned city of Pripyat, to confront the secrets of the past.

name: Haruka: Beyond the Stars
description: Haruka: Beyond the Stars is a juvenile sci-fi RPG about the intergalactic adventures of the protagonist, Yuuki, and a mysterious girl named Miiya. Set out on a spaceship and explore unique planets. Enjoy a thrilling adventure in the latest 3D anime art style.

name: The Warrior
description: A short and unique platformer with constantly changing protagonists, stories, and mechanics. Control legendary warriors, giant worms, greedy kings and lazy demons, each with their own purpose.

name: Spaceman Memories
description: Spaceman Memories is a retro JRPG that takes place in a distant future but draws inspiration from ancient Japanese folktales. A story full of wonder and nostalgia as you take on the role of Ichiro 94, an astronaut who wakes up from hypersleep to go on a journey to find the remnants of his past.

name: The RPG
description: An RPG-lite adventure with intentionally twisted traditional role-playing games aspects, where your choices do matter.

name: Marathon
description: A PvP-focused extraction shooter set on the mysterious planet of Tau Ceti IV, Marathon will see players inhabit the bodies of Runners, cybernetic mercenaries who have been designed to survive the planet’s harsh environments, exploring the lost colony that once inhabited Tau Ceti’s surface. Players will engage solo or in crews of three, searching for mysterious alien artifacts, as well as for valuable loot and new weapons and gear that they can add to their collection.

name: Sword of the Sea
description: Surf across the surreal undulating landscapes of the Necropolis on a quest to unveil a lost ocean teeming with life in Sword of the Sea.

name: Dunk City Dynasty
description: It's the hottest basketball game out, with gameplay deeper than you'd think!

name: Lost Colony
description: "Lost Colony" is a Twin-Stick Shooter Action-Roguelike set on an abandoned space colony. Guided by your drone companion, you must explore the planet and defend yourself from the swarms of aliens and the corrupted colony security system. Will you uncover the secrets of the Lost Colony?

name: Dream Channel Zero
description: Dive into a glitched-out game world! Explore synthwave skylines, fight freaky phantoms, and meet a whole host of quirky characters in this hysterically surreal adventure!

name: LoveSoTea
description: Tea-making simulator meets adventure game meets visual novel in the modern tale that is LoveSoTea. Once you complete it, you'll know how to brew the most delicious tea... maybe. No promises.

name: Pegdrop Hearts
description: A relaxing Peggle-like game with a cozy and emotional theme that will warm your heart, while you learn about love and self-respect. It's a relaxing Pachinko game for you to chill.

name: R-Type Tactics I & II Cosmos: Deluxe Edition
description: Includes R-Type Tactics I・II Cosmos: Standard Edition, Digital Soundtrack and a Poster

name: Enlightened
description: Enlightened is a survival horror game with strong focus on puzzle solving. Explore the hotel in which you woke up, find clues about what happened, solve puzzles and find a way out, while surviving horrors that awaits you there.

name: Mouse: P.I. For Hire
description: Join private detective John Mouston in MOUSE, a gritty, jazz-fueled shooter. With guns blazing and a retro rubber hose animation style, battle your way through a corrupt city full of crooks and danger. Inspired by classic FPS and noir films, MOUSE is the explosive shooter you've been waiting for.

name: Timeless Rain
description: Explore this foreign world and use manipulate time to defeat any creature who dares to stand between you and your goal! Meet the inhabitants of this strange realm as they push you towards finding the Timeless Rain...

name: The Precinct
description: Averno City, 1983. Gangs rule the streets and your father lies restless in his grave. Clean up the city, uncover the truth, and embark on thrilling vehicle chases through destructible environments in this neon-noir action sandbox police game.

name: VISK
description: Face your fears in VISK, an open-world online co-op horror game for 1-2 players. Escape from a strange village, uncover the dark secrets of this place and solve puzzles to discover new areas. But beware, deadly creatures are after you and your friend!

name: Cassette Boy
description: All you see is all there is - Cassette Boy: an RPG where what exists depends on you.

name: Evercore Heroes: Ascension
description:
Evercore Heroes: Ascension is a 3-Player Team Action Roguelite where you play as one of the Luum sentinels, tasked with restoring the natural balance of magic to the world. Pick your favorite hero, customize your loadout, and go out on missions with your friends across the different regions of Lumerea.

You are the only ones who can stop the Fate's Blade army and rebuild the magical treasure known as the Evercore. Of course, you won’t be expected to overcome all of the challenges on your first attempt! With each run you can unlock new ways to play, come up with new strategies & builds, regroup, and try again to win the day as a team!

name: Elder's Grace: Rise of the Mobley
description:
Join this epic battle to take back a magical homeland. Help Mobley heroes explore, build, raid and defend in an effort to regain & hold what's rightfully theirs.

Build and protect customized strongholds while creating specialized teams to explore and plunder others.

name: Talents
description: Write your way to success with your talented yet rowdy co-founders in this game development-themed romance visual novel! Do you have what it takes?

name: Soulbound
description: A Retro-modern roguelie adventure for 1-2 players. Enjoy responsive and skillful combat. Upgrade, unlock and progress. Fight curious enemies and meet charming friends. Embark on a strange adventure!

name: Bogdan's Cross
description: Embark on a journey of redemption as Bogdan, a fallen Templar seeking to make amends for his past sins. Explore a stunning world filled with ancient mysteries, uncover hidden secrets, and battle fierce enemies in this immersive action-adventure game.

name: Out of Action
description: Action heavy, multiplayer + singleplayer FPS set in a brutal cyberpunk universe.

name: Corr
description: Corr is a difficult Souls-lite Boss Rush Action RPG where you Run-n-Gun & Hack-n-Slash your way through challenging boss encounters. To endure the strange, dark and whacky world of Corr, level up and customize your warrior build with berserk powers, tonics, talismans and more.

name: Unhinged 2
description: You wake up and find yourself in the midst of a psychotic infestation, and gotta find a way out and avoid being chewed up into a red paste...

name: It Consumes
description: Use demonic sonar to reveal the world around you as you fight your way through Lovecraftian horrors in this roguelike arena FPS. Upgrade your abilities, discover hidden secrets, and climb the leaderboards as you plunge deeper and deeper into a world of total darkness.

name: Threat Actor
description: Threat Actor is a story rich, cybercrime-themed game, where you, an infamous hacker and paranoid owner of an underground marketplace, are ready to do whatever it takes to secure the legacy of your business as one of the most luxurious trading sites on the Dark Web.

name: A Call From Under the House
description: A Lovecraftian detective game using point-and-click style gameplay where the player must investigate a house suspected of cultish activity.

name: Arisen Force: Vonimir
description: "Arisen Force: Vonimir" is an A-RPG game featuring exquisite high-definition pixels, it combines the engaging RPG adventure storyline with the 2.5D combat experience.We create a magnificent Middle-Earth world, for players exploration and adventure, recruit teammates, collect and develop business, challenge enemies, reveal the secrets of the world, guide the future, forge your own legends .

name: VICCP 2 Core
description: The Very Important Central Control Panel is back. Keeping the mysterious atmosphere and with even more mysteries. Control the omnipotence remote, experiment, and find many endings. Brainstorming in retro sci-fi style / Puzzle / Quest / Point Click.

name: The Void Calls
description: The Void Calls, and you will answer. Explore the mysteries and secrets of Reprieve, a town stitched together from the dark past of its bizarre inhabitants in this horror-filled point-and-click adventure.
